When coming into contact with a Pulse Wave, this unit instead takes no damage and their attack range expands

enemy_1085_sotiwz_3.Description: A Sarkaz Caster mercenary loyal to Talulah. The Sarkaz ritual maintained by the Sarkaz Originium Altars will not damage them, instead strengthening their bodies and converting their attacks into Arts damage.
enemy_1085_sotiwz_3.Name: Mercenary Sarkaz Caster Leader

enemy_1086_ltsodr.Description: One of Leithanien's radicalized locals. The widespread popularity of classical Originium Arts has made them more threatening, and their attacks inflict Arts damage.
enemy_1086_ltsodr.Name: Leithanian Rebel

enemy_1086_ltsodr_2.Description: One of Leithanien's local militia leaders. The widespread popularity of classical Originium Arts has made them more threatening, and their attacks inflict Arts damage.
enemy_1086_ltsodr_2.Name: Leithanian Rebel Leader

enemy_1087_ltwolf.Description: A hunting hound trained and utilized by locals since ancient times. For early aboriginals and pioneers, these hounds were considered invaluable partners.
enemy_1087_ltwolf.Name: Winterwisp Hound

enemy_1087_ltwolf_2.Description: A pack leader trained and utilized by locals since ancient times. For early aboriginals and pioneers, these hounds were considered invaluable partners.
enemy_1087_ltwolf_2.Name: Winterwisp Hound Pro

AbilityList.Text: Continuously casts at the nearest non-enemy controlled 'Gramophone' within attack range to attempt to seize control of it.

enemy_1088_ltsmer.Description: An Arts user commonly seen throughout Leithanien. They attack using Arts, and will cast on L-44 'Gramophones' within their attack range to attempt to seize control of them.
enemy_1088_ltsmer.Name: Leithanian Whisperer

AbilityList.Text: Continuously casts at the nearest non-enemy controlled 'Gramophone' within attack range to attempt to seize control of it.

enemy_1088_ltsmer_2.Description: An experienced Leithanian combatant who utilizes Arts. Their Arts are more powerful, and they will cast on L-44 'Gramophones' within their attack range to attempt to seize control of them.
enemy_1088_ltsmer_2.Name: Leithanian Psalmist

AbilityList.Text: Will gradually lose HP over time
Upon death, deals Arts damage to all surrounding units and immediately seizes control of any 'Gramophones'

enemy_1089_ltlntc.Description: Locals who have studied the ancient Arts of Winterwisp are much more terrifying than modern Casters. Their ancient sacrificial rituals are capable of instantly dealing area Arts damage, as well as severing Arts ley lines to seize control of L-44 'Gramophones.'
enemy_1089_ltlntc.Name: Winterwisp Blood Shaman

AbilityList.Text: Will gradually lose HP over time
Upon death, deals a large amount of Arts damage to all surrounding units and immediately seizes control of any 'Gramophones'

enemy_1089_ltlntc_2.Description: A mixed-blood well-versed in Winterwisp's ancient Blood Arts, much more terrifying than modern Casters. Their ancient sacrificial rituals are capable of instantly dealing area Arts damage, as well as severing Arts ley lines to seize control of L-44 'Gramophones.'
enemy_1089_ltlntc_2.Name: Winterwisp Blood Magister

AbilityList.Text: Prioritizes attacking units that are vying for control of a 'Gramophone.'

enemy_1090_mdsnpr.Description: A member of Mudrock's Sarkaz squad. Integrating Sarkaz tactics with Leithanian Arts, they are capable of inflicting lethal damage with a block of energy, and prioritize attacking units closest to the contract entrance site.
enemy_1090_mdsnpr.Name: Mudrock Matterllurgist

AbilityList.Text: Prioritizes attacking units that are vying for control of a 'Gramophone.'
Attacks 2 targets simultaneously

enemy_1090_mdsnpr_2.Description: A member of Mudrock's Sarkaz squad. Integrating Sarkaz tactics with Leithanian Arts to greater effect, they are capable of inflicting lethal damage with a block of energy, and prioritize attacking units closest to the contract entrance site.
enemy_1090_mdsnpr_2.Name: Mudrock Matterllurgist Leader

AbilityList.Text: Has a Barrier that absorbs Arts damage.
Max HP and ASPD significantly increases while the Barrier persists.

enemy_1091_mdhmmr.Description: A member of Mudrock's Sarkaz squad. Dancing on the edge of life and death has led them to develop a unique tactical system. Using Arts Resonance, they can generate a Barrier that absorbs Arts damage and grants additional Max HP and ASPD while it persists.
enemy_1091_mdhmmr.Name: Mudrock Zealot

AbilityList.Text: Has a Barrier that absorbs Arts damage.
Max HP and ASPD significantly increases while the Barrier persists.

enemy_1091_mdhmmr_2.Description: An elite of Mudrock's Sarkaz squad. Dancing on the edge of life and death has led them to develop a unique tactical system. Using Arts Resonance, they can generate a Barrier that absorbs Arts damage and grants additional Max HP and ASPD while it persists.
enemy_1091_mdhmmr_2.Name: Mudrock Zealot Leader

enemy_1092_mdgint.Description: This Originium construct, crafted by Mudrock, does not possess sentience and must be directly controlled by Mudrock. Though bulky and slow, they are extremely durable and boast terrifying physical damage and survivability.
enemy_1092_mdgint.Name: Mudrock Colossus

enemy_1092_mdgint_2.Description: This Originium construct, crafted by Mudrock, has been entwined with ancient Sarkaz witchcraft and now serves as an extension of its owner's will. The principle behind this Originium Art is quite obscure, but these constructs undoubtedly boast greater survivability and destructive power than normal Colossi.
enemy_1092_mdgint_2.Name: Hexed Colossus

AbilityList.Text: Gains DEF when blocked.

enemy_1093_ccsbr.Description: One of Acahualla's most commonly-seen warriors who uses a crude spear to attack. May pose unexpected difficulties if fighting at close range.
enemy_1093_ccsbr.Name: Tiacauh Warrior

AbilityList.Text: Gains DEF when blocked.

enemy_1093_ccsbr_2.Description: A braver, fiercer warrior who uses a crude spear to attack. Years of training have given these warriors tough physiques, and they fear not even the fiercest attacks.
enemy_1093_ccsbr_2.Name: Tiacauh Guard

enemy_1094_ccspm.Description: Not much different from a regular warrior, except they've learned to throw their spears. Though their range is limited, they get the job done.
enemy_1094_ccspm.Name: Tiacauh Impaler

enemy_1094_ccspm_2.Description: Warriors who have gained greater proficiency in using thrown weapons due to training, and boast greater lethality. However, due to the weight of their weapons, their range hasn't really improved.
enemy_1094_ccspm_2.Name: Tiacauh Impaler Adept

AbilityList.Text: Every attack reduces the enemy's DEF

enemy_1095_ccripr.Description: A fervent Tiacauh warrior with very fast attack speed. Though each strike is not particularly powerful, those caught off guard will be quickly subdued by a rain of blows.
enemy_1095_ccripr.Name: Tiacauh Fanatic

AbilityList.Text: Every attack reduces the enemy's DEF

enemy_1095_ccripr_2.Description: An extremely fervent Tiacauh warrior with very fast attack speed. Each strike now deals noteworthy damage, and those caught off guard will be quickly subdued by a rain of blows.
enemy_1095_ccripr_2.Name: Tiacauh Ripper

AbilityList.Text: Gains DEF when blocked, and deals Physical damage with melee attacks.

enemy_1096_ccwitch.Description: The very few Originium Arts users in Acahualla will often serve as doctors for their tribe. Despite not developing their Originium Arts, their medical experience lets them strike where it hurts.
enemy_1096_ccwitch.Name: Tiacauh Ritualist

AbilityList.Text: Gains DEF when blocked, and deals high Physical damage with melee attacks

enemy_1096_ccwitch_2.Description: These extremely rare Arts users from Acahualla have a deeper understanding of Originium Arts. With more threatening Arts in their arsenal and years of medical experience, they are a force to be reckoned with if allowed to approach up-close.
enemy_1096_ccwitch_2.Name: Tiacauh Shaman

AbilityList.Text: After several attacks, destroys Giant Mushrooms and Stumps, rendering them unable to be deployed upon

enemy_1097_cclmbjk.Description: One of Zumama's chosen elites, bestowed with excellent equipment. In addition to being potent in combat, they have the ability to destroy terrain in order to seize the advantage. Those who seek to use long-range attacks against them will have to diversify their tactics.
enemy_1097_cclmbjk.Name: Tiacauh Shredder

AbilityList.Text: After several attacks, destroys Giant Mushrooms and Stumps, rendering them unable to be deployed upon

enemy_1097_cclmbjk_2.Description: One of Zumama's chosen elites, bestowed with superlative equipment. In addition to being potent in combat, they have the ability to destroy terrain in order to seize the advantage. Those who seek to use long-range attacks against them will have to diversify their tactics.
enemy_1097_cclmbjk_2.Name: Tiacauh Annihilator

AbilityList.Text: When blocked, this unit will only receive damage from the unit blocking it, and the DEF of both units is decreased.

enemy_1098_cchmpn.Description: A very formidable Tiacauh warrior, naturally born to do battle. These warriors harbor great pride in their combat abilities, and live for the thrill of the duel no matter where they are. Their single-mindedness allows them to shrug off all outside interference.
enemy_1098_cchmpn.Name: Tiacauh Brave

AbilityList.Text: When blocked, this unit will only receive damage from the unit blocking it, and the DEF of both units is decreased.

enemy_1098_cchmpn_2.Description: An incredibly formidable Tiacauh warrior, with the qualifications to become a Warchief. These warriors harbor great pride in their combat abilities, and live for the thrill of the duel no matter where they are. Their single-mindedness allows them to shrug off all outside interference.
enemy_1098_cchmpn_2.Name: Tiacauh Champion

enemy_1099_nbkght.Description: An independent Kazimierz knight. A low profile and unrefined skill means this one will soon be swept away in the tide of knight competition.
enemy_1099_nbkght.Name: Nameless Independent Knight

enemy_1099_nbkght_2.Description: An independent Kazimierz knight with some degree of achievement, though not enough to inspire any confidence. Sooner or later, they'll probably get swallowed up by the competition.
enemy_1099_nbkght_2.Name: Nameless Elite Knight

enemy_1100_scorpn.Description: Infected creatures commonly found in the great lakes and rivers of Kazimierz, captured and raised by casters and used as tools to train knights and entertain fight spectators.
enemy_1100_scorpn.Name: Training Gloompincer

enemy_1100_scorpn_2.Description: Infected creatures commonly found in the great lakes and rivers of Kazimierz, these male gloompincers are fed special hormones and made more aggressive than the regular ones. They're a cruel tool to train knights and entertain fight spectators.
enemy_1100_scorpn_2.Name: Vicious Training Gloompincer

AbilityList.Text: Has significantly increased DEF and RES for a period of time

enemy_1101_plkght.Description: Wearing the high-performance, lightweight armor provided by Roar Guards, this new batch of experimental armor has some humorous deficiencies that made these people into pitiful test subjects. 'Roar Guards, even the winds will bow to you!'
enemy_1101_plkght.Name: Roar Knightclub Trainee

AbilityList.Text: Has significantly increased DEF and RES for a period of time

enemy_1101_plkght_2.Description: Wearing the high-performance, lightweight armor provided by Roar Guards, this new batch of experimental armor has some humorous deficiencies, and even though these are battle-hardened knights, they have still been reduced to pitiful test subjects. 'Roar Guards, even the winds will bow to you!'
enemy_1101_plkght_2.Name: Roar Knightclub Elite

AbilityList.Text: Starts with significantly increased DEF and RES, persists for a long period.

enemy_1101_plkght_3.Description: The first member of Roar Knightclub's Majors team, now representative of Roar Arena: Tough armor, defensive counterattack, a hundred thousand fans, worth a million! Don't forget! 'Roar Guards, even the winds will bow to you!'
enemy_1101_plkght_3.Name: 'Plastic' Szewczyk

enemy_1102_sdkght.Description: An independent Kazimierz knight. In the ever-changing competition circuit, relying on defense to steadily rack up points is an effective strategy.
enemy_1102_sdkght.Name: Independent Knight Shielder

enemy_1102_sdkght_2.Description: An independent Kazimierz knight, with more expensive equipment, on the verge of finding a sponsor. In the ever-changing competition circuit, relying on defense to steadily rack up points is an effective strategy.
enemy_1102_sdkght_2.Name: Elite Knight Shielder

AbilityList.Text: Each time an enemy is defeated, gains ATK and ASPD, stacking up to 10 times.

enemy_1103_wdkght.Description: A trainee from the Bloodboil Knightclub. The Bloodboil Knights have long been known for their ferocity and aggression, from trainees to knight nobles. Whenever one of their brothers falls, they gain courage and combat prowess.
enemy_1103_wdkght.Name: Bloodboil Knightclub Trainee

AbilityList.Text: Each time an enemy is defeated, gains ATK and ASPD, stacking up to 10 times.

enemy_1103_wdkght_2.Description: A regular knight from the Bloodboil Knightclub. The Bloodboil Knights have long been known for their ferocity and aggression, from trainees to knight nobles. Whenever one of their brothers falls, they gain courage and combat prowess.
enemy_1103_wdkght_2.Name: Bloodboil Knightclub Elite

AbilityList.Text: Each time an enemy is defeated, gains ATK and ASPD, stacking up to 10 times.

enemy_1103_wdkght_3.Description: The great knight known as the 'Butcher of the Field'! Convicted several times for acts of brutality, avoided trial several times thanks to corporate contributions! Youngest son of the Ingra family, an ancient knightly lineage! A ruthless fighter who gets stronger with each battle! Olmerrrrrr Ingraaaaaaa!
enemy_1103_wdkght_3.Name: 'Brassrust' Olmer Ingra

AbilityList.Text: Significantly decreases ATK of the unit with the highest ATK for a period of time
Rebirth

enemy_1104_lfkght.Description: A trainee from the Blade Helmet Knightclub. This order of young competition knights chose the name of the ancient heroes of Kazimierz. In fact, they exhibit only arrogance and complacency from that extinct lineage. They are good at picking fights and don't go down easily.
enemy_1104_lfkght.Name: Blade Helmet Knightclub Trainee

AbilityList.Text: Significantly decreases ATK of the unit with the highest ATK for a period of time
Rebirth

enemy_1104_lfkght_2.Description: A regular knight from the Blade Helmet Knightclub. This order of young competition knights chose the name of the ancient heroes of Kazimierz. In fact, they exhibit only arrogance and complacency from that extinct lineage. They are good at picking fights and don't go down easily.
enemy_1104_lfkght_2.Name: Blade Helmet Knightclub Elite

AbilityList.Text: Significantly decreases ATK of the unit with the highest ATK for a period of time
Rebirth

enemy_1104_lfkght_3.Description: His nose is high as the sun, and he's almost as terrifyingly strong, if much, much colder. And look how many fans have lined up for him! He's 'Left-hand' Tytus Topola! He weakens his enemies' resolve, crushes their spirit, sneering down at them as they fall to their knees in surrender. That's a Left-handed victory!
enemy_1104_lfkght_3.Name: 'Left-hand' Tytus Topola

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter
When destroyed, grants a deployable unit

enemy_1105_tyokai.Description: Ellen Select Technology thanks you for your sponsorship! This quick and affordable drone carries the passion of the fans, bringing anything to the knights on the field: traps, explosives, medicine, or even snacks! The outcome of the battle is in your hands!
enemy_1105_tyokai.Name: Sponsor Drone

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter
When destroyed, grants a large number of deployable units

enemy_1105_tyokai_2.Description: Ellen Select Technology thanks you for your generous sponsorship! This heavy and luxurious drone carries the passion of the fans, bringing anything to the knights on the field: devices, fishing rods, or carbonated beverages! The outcome of the battle is in your hands!
enemy_1105_tyokai_2.Name: Luxury Sponsor Drone

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter
Upon death, significantly increase ASPD and DEF of our units on the field for a period.

enemy_1106_byokai.Description: Ellen Select Technology thanks you for your heartfelt sponsorship! This drone broadcasts select commercials from the General Chamber of Commerce to knights and spectators at all times, stimulating the crowd and making the competition that much more exciting!
enemy_1106_byokai.Name: Cheering Sponsor Drone

AbilityList.Text: Can use long-ranged weapons to attack <Ursus Civilians> and <Talulah, the Fighter>

enemy_1107_uoffcr.Description: An officer tasked with hunting the Infected of Ursus. Greedy and cold-blooded.
enemy_1107_uoffcr.Name: Infected Patrol Captain

AbilityList.Text: Can use long-ranged weapons to attack <Ursus Civilians> and <Talulah, the Fighter>

enemy_1107_uoffcr_2.Description: A high-ranking officer tasked with hunting the Infected of Ursus. Greedy and cold-blooded. They are not a part of the army, and are generally despised by Ursus soldiers and city officials alike.
enemy_1107_uoffcr_2.Name: Elite Infected Patrol Captain

enemy_1108_uterer.Description: A warbeast trained by the Ursus Army. Obedient and relentless, they tear through armor with ease to sate their thirst for flesh and blood.
enemy_1108_uterer.Name: Ursus Mangler

enemy_1108_uterer_2.Description: A warbeast pack leader trained by the Ursus Army. Obedient and relentless, they tear through armor with ease to sate their thirst for flesh and blood. Nobody has ever seen a male mangler.
enemy_1108_uterer_2.Name: Ursus Mangler Packmother

AbilityList.Text: Able to land directly onto the battlefield.

enemy_1109_uabone.Description: An Ursus soldier who is proficient at infiltrating deep into enemy territory. Equipped with a powerful heavy-duty crossbow.
enemy_1109_uabone.Name: Ursus Assault Crossbowman

AbilityList.Text: Able to land directly onto the battlefield.

enemy_1109_uabone_2.Description: An Ursus soldier who is exceptionally proficient at infiltrating deep into enemy territory. Equipped with an extremely powerful heavy-duty crossbow.
enemy_1109_uabone_2.Name: Elite Ursus Assault Crossbowman

enemy_1110_uamord.Description: A basic caster in the Ursus Army. Clad in simple armor.
enemy_1110_uamord.Name: Ursus Armored Caster

enemy_1110_uamord_2.Description: A basic caster in the Ursus Army who has displayed excellence. They are clad in armor and wield more powerful Arts.
enemy_1110_uamord_2.Name: Elite Ursus Armored Caster

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 2 Block
Can use long-ranged weapons to attack <Ursus Civilians> and <Talulah, the Fighter>

enemy_1111_ucommd.Description: Special forces within the Ursus Army that strike a balance between mobility and breakthrough capabilities. Good at fighting underequipped enemy forces.
enemy_1111_ucommd.Name: Ursus Raider

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 2 Block
Can use long-ranged weapons to attack <Ursus Civilians> and <Talulah, the Fighter>

enemy_1111_ucommd_2.Description: Captains within the Ursus Army that strike a balance between mobility and breakthrough capabilities, equipped with higher-quality armor. Good at fighting underequipped enemy forces.
enemy_1111_ucommd_2.Name: Ursus Raider Leader

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.

enemy_1112_emppnt.Description: A heavily-armored, sturdily-built drone operated by artillery casters of the Ursus army. They presage the withering firepower of the Ursus Artillery.
enemy_1112_emppnt.Name: Imperial Artillery Targeteer

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.

enemy_1112_emppnt_2.Description: A heavily-armored, sturdily-built core drone operated by artillery technicians of the Ursus army. They presage the withering firepower of the Ursus Artillery. The Ursus Artillery is a fire team that has bunkered down into the city. Though packing less firepower than naval guns, their equipment still shreds through buildings and armor with ease.
enemy_1112_emppnt_2.Name: Imperial Artillery Core Targeteer

AbilityList.Text: Gains significantly increased ATK when HP is under 50%

enemy_1113_empace.Description: The powerful infantry of the Ursus Army, the backbone of the Imperial Army's aggressive advance. They are versatile in offense and defense, melee and ranged. After sustain a certain amount of damage, their morale will peak, causing them to inflict more destruction.
enemy_1113_empace.Name: Imperial Striker

AbilityList.Text: Gains significantly increased ATK when HP is under 50%

enemy_1113_empace_2.Description: The powerful, battle-tested infantry of the Ursus Army, the backbone of the Imperial Army's aggressive advance. They are versatile in offense and defense, melee and ranged. After sustain a certain amount of damage, their morale will peak, causing them to inflict more destruction. Along with the Shieldguards, they formed the front line of the Ursus Army.
enemy_1113_empace_2.Name: Elite Imperial Striker

AbilityList.Text: Attacks 3 enemies simultaneously
Restores a certain amount of HP after each attack, based upon damage dealt

enemy_1114_rgrdmn.Description: A Sarkaz mercenary unwittingly converted into one of Mephisto's Herd, able to damage multiple targets at once and drain vitality from its victims. Prevents others from entering the Sarcophagus - do not push too far in, and you may yet avoid their wrath.
enemy_1114_rgrdmn.Name: Sarkaz Centurion Host

AbilityList.Text: Attacks 3 enemies simultaneously
Restores a certain amount of HP after each attack, based upon damage dealt

enemy_1114_rgrdmn_2.Description: A Sarkaz mercenary leader unwittingly converted into one of Mephisto's Herd, able to damage multiple targets at once and drain vitality from its victims. More ferociously prevents others from entering the Sarcophagus.
enemy_1114_rgrdmn_2.Name: Sarkaz Centurion Nidus Guard

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be attacked, will not deplete Life Points on leaving the field
Permanently applies [Weaken] to <Talulah, the Fighter> (Greatly reduces DEF and RES)

enemy_1115_embald.Description: A manifestation of a certain will in Ursus. The most terrifying military force in the entirety of Ursus, they are widely-known throughout the world only as horrifying spectres of legend and yore. A single one is enough to slaughter entire squads. Defeat has never been a possibility.
enemy_1115_embald.Name: 'Emperor's Blade'

AbilityList.Text: Does not deplete Life Points when spared, but will deplete a Life Point upon dying
Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter

enemy_3001_upeopl.Description: An ordinary Ursus citizen caught in the crossfire. A part of the cruelty and suffering of this world.
enemy_3001_upeopl.Name: Ursus Civilian

AbilityList.Text: Does not deduct Life Points when entering the enemy Incursion Point, but will instead deduct Life Points upon dying
Applies [Burning Breath] to an enemy within attack range (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be <$ba.buffres>Resisted</>)
Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter

enemy_3002_ftrtal.Description: The Infected warrior, Talulah. She will never look back.
enemy_3002_ftrtal.Name: Talulah, the Fighter

AbilityList.Text: Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, ASPD is reduced
Freed after a few attacks, gaining increased ATK

enemy_1116_liprr.Description: A commonly seen prisoner of Mansfield State Prison. Even so, don't let your guard down or he'll slip past you.
enemy_1116_liprr.Name: Ordinary Prisoner

AbilityList.Text: Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, ASPD is reduced
Freed after a few attacks, gaining increased ATK

enemy_1116_liprr_2.Description: An inmate deeply familiar with the laws of survival of Mansfield State Prison. Will utilize his accumulated experience to outsmart you and is difficult to deal with.
enemy_1116_liprr_2.Name: Seasoned Prisoner

AbilityList.Text: Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, ASPD is reduced
Freed after a few attacks, gaining increased ATK and now deals Arts damage
Prioritizes attacking Imprisonment Devices

enemy_1117_liiprr.Description: An inmate who cobbled together a ranged weapon to avoid getting into brawls. Knows a little about Originium Arts and can strengthen his 'arrows'.
enemy_1117_liiprr.Name: Sniper Prisoner

AbilityList.Text: Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, ASPD is reduced
Freed after a few attacks, gaining increased ATK and now deals Arts damage
Prioritizes attacking Imprisonment Devices

enemy_1117_liiprr_2.Description: An inmate experienced at using handmade ranged weapons. Though far from a master in Originium Arts, his arrows are already extremely dangerous.
enemy_1117_liiprr_2.Name: Elite Sniper Prisoner

AbilityList.Text: Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, ASPD is reduced
Freed after a few attacks, gaining increased ATK and attacks ignore a certain portion of the target's DEF

enemy_1118_lidbox.Description: An inmate who puts his trust in his fists. ——In reality, the metal chains on his wrists are doing most of the work.
enemy_1118_lidbox.Name: Pugilist Prisoner

AbilityList.Text: Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, ASPD is reduced
Freed after a few attacks, gaining increased ATK and attacks ignore a certain portion of the target's DEF

enemy_1118_lidbox_2.Description: An inmate who wholeheartedly trusts in his fists. Do not underestimate this inmate who is able to utilize both fist and chain in harmony now.
enemy_1118_lidbox_2.Name: Elite Pugilist Prisoner

AbilityList.Text: Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, ASPD is reduced
Freed after a few attacks, gaining increased ATK and RES and regenerates HP over time

enemy_1119_vofsd.Description: An inmate with great strength. The weapons in his hands seem to have been acquired from ransacking a storage room. During a melee, will often rush to the frontline and inflict great damage.
enemy_1119_vofsd.Name: Strongman Prisoner

AbilityList.Text: Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, ASPD is reduced
Freed after a few attacks, gaining increased ATK and RES and regenerates HP over time

enemy_1119_vofsd_2.Description: An inmate with immense strength. The weapons in his hands seem to have been acquired from ransacking a storage room. During a melee, will often rush to the frontline and inflict great damage.
enemy_1119_vofsd_2.Name: Herculean Prisoner

AbilityList.Text: All enemies gain increased ASPD when on the field
Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, does not attack but gains increased DEF
After being freed, attacks 2 enemies simultaneously and prioritizes attacking Imprisonment Devices

enemy_1120_vofwiz.Description: An inmate with a weak constitution. Due to being unable to overcome his bindings on his own, he's instead learned to utilize defensive techniques using the devices on his body. On the other hand, he's well-versed in Originium Arts and will become very difficult to deal with should he be freed.
enemy_1120_vofwiz.Name: Caster Prisoner

AbilityList.Text: All enemies gain significantly increased ASPD when on the field
Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, does not attack but gains increased DEF
After being freed, attacks 2 enemies simultaneously and prioritizes attacking Imprisonment Devices

enemy_1120_vofwiz_2.Description: An inmate with a weak constitution. Due to being unable to overcome his bindings on his own, he's instead learned to utilize defensive techniques using the devices on his body. On the other hand, he's extremely well-versed in Originium Arts and will become very difficult to deal with should he be freed.
enemy_1120_vofwiz_2.Name: Deadly Caster Prisoner

AbilityList.Text: Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, ASPD is reduced but gains increased DEF
Freed after a few attacks, gaining increased ATK
When freed for the first time, immediately frees all other enemies

enemy_1121_lifbos.Description: A vicious inmate feared by inmates and guards alike. Has learned patience after his long stay in prison, and pays no attention to normal attacks and provocations. However, avoid enraging him at all costs, or be prepared to face the consequences.
enemy_1121_lifbos.Name: Recidivist

AbilityList.Text: Starts imprisoned. When imprisoned, ASPD is reduced but gains increased DEF
Freed after a few attacks, gaining increased ATK
When freed for the first time, immediately frees all other enemies

enemy_1121_lifbos_2.Description: A legendary prisoner whose might is second only to that of Anthony. Has learned patience after his long stay in prison, and pays no attention to normal attacks and provocations. However, avoid enraging him at all costs, or be prepared to face the consequences.
enemy_1121_lifbos_2.Name: Infamous Recidivist

enemy_1122_sphond.Description: A beastly Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. It has a bad temper and likes to eat apricots. It follows its master's wishes and frolics about in the painting scroll, occasionally taking a bite out of it.
enemy_1122_sphond.Name: 'Angry'

enemy_1122_sphond_2.Description: A beastly Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. It has an even worse temper and doesn't want to eat apricots anymore. It follows its master's wishes and frolics about in the painting scroll, occasionally taking a bite out of it.
enemy_1122_sphond_2.Name: Anxious 'Angry'

enemy_1123_spsbr.Description: A common Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. It's very smart and actually understands human speech. Apparently some kind of communal organism, it gets lonely when left by itself. It has done many a mean thing out of amusement for it's just an Ink Spirit, no matter how smart.
enemy_1123_spsbr.Name: 'Bitey'

enemy_1123_spsbr_2.Description: A common Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. It's very smart and actually understands human speech. Apparently some kind of communal organism, it gets lonely when left by itself. Now it's actually getting down to business like a real Ink Spirit.
enemy_1123_spsbr_2.Name: Serious 'Bitey'

AbilityList.Text: Prioritize attacking opposite attribute enemies

enemy_1124_spbow.Description: A crafty Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Very proud of itself and its tricks. Not above letting its allies charge straight into traps before betraying them. It will prioritize attacking opposite attribute enemies.
enemy_1124_spbow.Name: 'Stabby'

AbilityList.Text: Prioritize attacking opposite attribute enemies

enemy_1124_spbow_2.Description: A crafty Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Very proud of itself and its tricks. Instinctively suppresses its enemies by attacking their weak spots for damage. It will prioritize attacking opposite attribute enemies.
enemy_1124_spbow_2.Name: Flanking 'Stabby'

AbilityList.Text: More likely to be targeted by attacks.

enemy_1125_spshld.Description: A majestic Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Looks weird, just like it's carrying a mountain on its back. Since it doesn't move much, it's often taken for a decorative feature. Can draw enemies to attack it, unfathomably tough.
enemy_1125_spshld.Name: 'Lazy'

AbilityList.Text: More likely to be targeted by attacks.

enemy_1125_spshld_2.Description: A majestic Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Looks weird, just like it's carrying a mountain on its back. As still as a mountain when not moving, but bears down on its enemies like boulders tumbling down a mountain when in a team. Can draw enemies to attack it, unfathomably tough.
enemy_1125_spshld_2.Name: Unmoving 'Lazy'

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by player's units of the same attribute.
Explodes upon death, dealing Arts damage to friendly units. Causes even greater damage if similar units of the opposite attribute are in its vicinity

enemy_1126_spslme.Description: A strange Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Seems to be alive. Very lively with its movements and likes to wander around. Not very commonly seen as it explodes if it touches any fellow Ink Spirits with opposite attributes.
enemy_1126_spslme.Name: 'Smarty'

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by player's units of the same attribute.
Explodes upon death, dealing Arts damage to friendly units. Causes even greater damage if similar units of the opposite attribute are in its vicinity

enemy_1126_spslme_2.Description: A strange Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Seems to be alive. Very lively with its movements and likes to wander around. It explodes if it touches any fellow Ink Spirits with opposite attributes, so any survivors tend to be even more powerful.
enemy_1126_spslme_2.Name: Dazzled 'Smarty'

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by player's units of the same attribute.

enemy_1127_sptrkg.Description: A reckless Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Rushes forward single-mindedly, its surroundings be damned, and tends to find itself in all kinds of predicaments because of that. Doesn't get along with Stabby. Can only be blocked by units of the same attribute.
enemy_1127_sptrkg.Name: 'Blindey'

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by player's units of the same attribute.

enemy_1127_sptrkg_2.Description: A reckless Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Still rushes forward single-mindedly, as though its sole purpose in life is to march forward. Doesn't get along with Stabby. Can only be blocked by units of the same attribute.
enemy_1127_sptrkg_2.Name: Indefatigable 'Blindey'

AbilityList.Text: Can charge its attacks. If not interrupted, causes Arts damage and shifts target's Ming and Hui attribute.

enemy_1128_spmage.Description: A fearsome Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Frightening in appearance and feared by all. Very territorial and doesn't get along with most other Ink Spirits. Actually a very nervous guy who has trouble sleeping. Arts can shift Hui and Ming.
enemy_1128_spmage.Name: 'Envy'

AbilityList.Text: Can charge its attacks. If not interrupted, causes Arts damage and shifts target's Ming and Hui attribute.

enemy_1128_spmage_2.Description: A fearsome Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Frightening in appearance and feared by all. Very territorial and doesn't get along with most other Ink Spirits. Its emotions and behavioral patterns are particularly complex, perhaps even more so than mere man. Arts can shift Hui and Ming.
enemy_1128_spmage_2.Name: Complicated 'Envy'

AbilityList.Text: Greatly increases ATK when attacking opposite attribute targets

enemy_1129_spklr.Description: A strong Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Large and robust, but not very good at thinking. Tends to fall into the simplest traps and needs Bitey to save its ass. Gains attack power against opposite attribute enemies.
enemy_1129_spklr.Name: 'Fury'

AbilityList.Text: Greatly increases ATK when attacking opposite attribute targets

enemy_1129_spklr_2.Description: A strong Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Its great power and might is how it frees itself from the worries of having to think, allowing it to destroy all in its wake with its flaming inferno. Other than its buddy Bitey, that is. Gains attack power against opposite attribute enemies.
enemy_1129_spklr_2.Name: Unbridled 'Fury'

AbilityList.Text: Splits into 2 <Originiutant Excrescences> upon death

enemy_1130_infstr.Description: A corpse being controlled by a parasitic Originiutant Excrescence.
enemy_1130_infstr.Name: Originiutant Puppet

AbilityList.Text: Splits into 2 <Originiutant Excrescences> upon death

enemy_1131_sbeast.Description: A sand beast infected by an Originiutant. Sand beasts are a species of small-sized omnivores that primarily inhabit deserts and hamadas. They are nocturnal in nature and are often tamed by the local Sargonians to be used as hunting beasts.
enemy_1131_sbeast.Name: Mutant Sand Beast

AbilityList.Text: Splits into 2 <Originiutant Tumors> upon death

enemy_1131_sbeast_2.Description: A sand beast infected and severely mutated by an Originiutant. Sand beasts are a species of small-sized omnivores that primarily inhabit deserts and hamadas. They are nocturnal in nature and are often tamed by the local Sargonians to be used as hunting beasts.
enemy_1131_sbeast_2.Name: Mutant Sand Beast α

AbilityList.Text: Splits into 3 <Originiutant Excrescences> upon death

enemy_1132_sarchn.Description: A rock spider infected by an Originiutant. Due to their similar appearances, rock spiders are often mistakenly believed to be a close relative of Infused Originium Slugs. However, the latest research shows that they are two completely different species.
enemy_1132_sarchn.Name: Mutant Rock Spider

AbilityList.Text: Splits into 3 <Originiutant Tumors> upon death

enemy_1132_sarchn_2.Description: A rock spider infected and severely mutated by an Originiutant. Due to their similar appearances, rock spiders are often mistakenly believed to be a close relative of Infused Originium Slugs. However, the latest research shows that they are two completely different species.
enemy_1132_sarchn_2.Name: Mutant Rock Spider α

AbilityList.Text: Periodically creates an <Originiutant Excrescence>
Splits into 4 <Originiutant Excrescences> upon death

enemy_1133_harchn.Description: A giant rock spider infected by an Originiutant. Giant rock spiders are a subspecies of rock spider found only in Sargon. They possess a large circular abdomen used to store energy.
enemy_1133_harchn.Name: Mutant Giant Rock Spider

AbilityList.Text: Periodically creates an <Originiutant Tumor>
Splits into 4 <Originiutant Tumors> upon death

enemy_1133_harchn_2.Description: A giant rock spider infected and severely mutated by an Originiutant. Giant rock spiders are a subspecies of rock spider found only in Sargon. They possess a large circular abdomen used to store energy.
enemy_1133_harchn_2.Name: Mutant Giant Rock Spider α

enemy_1134_diamd.Description: An Originiutant mutant that was weaponized for some purpose. Possesses an incredibly tough outer shell.
enemy_1134_diamd.Name: Originiutant

enemy_1134_diamd_2.Description: An Originiutant mutant that was weaponized for some purpose. Even more ferocious and terrifying than usual.
enemy_1134_diamd_2.Name: Originiutant α

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.invisible>Invisible</>
Only performs ranged attacks against allied units caught inside the <Sandstorm>

enemy_1135_redman.Description: A special mercenary sniper who excels at ambushing targets exposed in harsh environments. 'Redmark Contracts' are tailor-made for elite and powerful mercenaries with a distinct lack of morals. The initiators of such contracts are ruthless and definitely up to no good.
enemy_1135_redman.Name: 'Redmark' Eradicator

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.invisible>Invisible</>

enemy_1135_redman_2.Description: An elite mercenary sniper who excels at ambushing targets exposed in harsh environments. 'Redmark Contracts' are tailor-made for elite and powerful mercenaries with a distinct lack of morals. The initiators of such contracts are ruthless and definitely up to no good.
enemy_1135_redman_2.Name: 'Redmark' Elite Eradicator

AbilityList.Text: Creates a <Holographic Mirage> upon taking damage for the first time
While the <Holographic Mirage> exists, cannot be blocked and becomes less likely to be attacked
Gains Physical and Arts Dodge while within the <Sandstorm>

enemy_1136_redace.Description: A special mercenary infiltrator who carries high-tech projection equipment, specializing in infiltrating enemy forces within harsh environments. 'Redmark Contracts' are tailor-made for elite and powerful mercenaries with a distinct lack of morals. The initiators of such contracts are ruthless and definitely up to no good.
enemy_1136_redace.Name: 'Redmark' Infiltrator

While the <Holographic Mirage MK2> exists, cannot be blocked and becomes less likely to be attacked
Gains Physical and Arts Dodge while within the <Sandstorm>

enemy_1136_redace_2.Description: An elite mercenary infiltrator who carries high-tech projection equipment, specializing in infiltrating enemy forces within harsh environments. 'Redmark Contracts' are tailor-made for elite and powerful mercenaries with a distinct lack of morals. The initiators of such contracts are ruthless and definitely up to no good.
enemy_1136_redace_2.Name: 'Redmark' Elite Infiltrator

AbilityList.Text: Drains 1 Life Point when entering the Objective Point

enemy_1137_plasm.Description: A twisted organism born under the combined effects of radiation mutation and Originium infection.
enemy_1137_plasm.Name: Originiutant Excrescence

AbilityList.Text: Drains 1 Life Point when entering the Objective Point
When blocked, significantly reduces the blocker's ASPD

enemy_1138_tumor.Description: A twisted organism born under the combined effects of radiation mutation and Originium infection. The malign tumors on these organisms' bodies still contain a large amount of hazardous substances.
enemy_1138_tumor.Name: Originiutant Tumor

AbilityList.Text: Unable to move

enemy_1139_hologc.Description: Tactical Originium Equipment developed by a certain Columbian tech company. Generates a realistic holographic projection to obstruct enemies.
enemy_1139_hologc.Name: Holographic Mirage

AbilityList.Text: Unable to move

enemy_1139_hologc_2.Description: The newest model of Tactical Originium Equipment developed by a certain Columbian tech company. Generates a realistic holographic projection to obstruct enemies.
enemy_1139_hologc_2.Name: Holographic Mirage MK2

enemy_1140_merhd.Description: An infected creature controlled by a Caster. Hounds are widely used by mercenaries, though some Perros object to it.
enemy_1140_merhd.Name: Tactical Hound

enemy_1140_merhd_2.Description: An infected creature controlled by a Caster. Having gone through rigorous training, they now pose a much greater threat. Hounds are widely used by mercenaries, though some Perros object to it.
enemy_1140_merhd_2.Name: Tactical Hound Pro

AbilityList.Text: Before the first attack, calls for <Scrap> to support the battle from the Mobile Tactical Hangar

enemy_1141_merbow.Description: A mercenary using ranged weaponry. Uses a crossbow in battle and calls for the offensive Air Support Drone 'Scrap' to carry out aerial bombardment.
enemy_1141_merbow.Name: Tactical Crossbowman

enemy_1141_merbow_2.Description: A mercenary using ranged weaponry. Uses a crossbow in battle and calls for the more powerful offensive Air Support Drone 'Scrap Model-U' to carry out aerial bombardment.
enemy_1141_merbow_2.Name: Tactical Crossbowman Leader

AbilityList.Text: The first time HP drops below half, calls for <Anvil> to support the battle from the Mobile Tactical Hangar

enemy_1142_mershd.Description: A mercenary clad in heavy armor. Has extremely strong defensive capabilities and utilizes the Air Support Drone 'Anvil' to provide defensive support to their allies.
enemy_1142_mershd.Name: Tactical Defender

AbilityList.Text: The first time HP drops below half, calls for <Anvil Model-B> to support the battle from the Mobile Tactical Hangar

enemy_1142_mershd_2.Description: A mercenary clad in heavy armor. Has even stronger defensive capabilities and utilizes the more powerful Air Support Drone 'Anvil Model-B' to provide defensive support to their allies.
enemy_1142_mershd_2.Name: Tactical Defender Leader

AbilityList.Text: Can fire a super long-range grenade, dealing AoE Physical damage
After firing, significantly increases Movement Speed and can only perform melee attacks

enemy_1143_merrpg.Description: A mercenary specializing in anti-armor combat. Carries a single-use grenade launcher which is discarded after firing along with other non-essential equipment, after which they charge at high speed towards the enemy.
enemy_1143_merrpg.Name: Anti-Armor Infantry

AbilityList.Text: Can fire a super long-range grenade, dealing AoE Physical damage
After firing, significantly increases Movement Speed and can only perform melee attacks

enemy_1143_merrpg_2.Description: A mercenary specializing in anti-armor combat. Carries a powerful single-use grenade launcher which is discarded after firing along with other non-essential equipment, after which they charge at high speed towards the enemy.
enemy_1143_merrpg_2.Name: Anti-Armor Infantry Leader

AbilityList.Text: On first attack, immediately dispatches <Scrap> to support the battle from the Mobile Tactical Hangar
The first time HP drops below half, immediately dispatches <Anvil> from the Mobile Tactical Hangar to support the battle
When on the field, all Air Support Drones gain greatly increased Movement Speed

enemy_1144_merlgd.Description: The 'War Phantoms' were once a legendary band of mercenaries. In the wake of their bloody legacy, mercenaries and bounty hunters began referring to powerful, cruel veteran warriors with the same title. Strong and adept at controlling multiple types of Air Support Drones.
enemy_1144_merlgd.Name: War Phantom

AbilityList.Text: On first attack, immediately dispatches <Scrap Model-U> to support the battle from the Mobile Tactical Hangar
The first time HP drops below half, immediately dispatches <Anvil Model-B> from the Mobile Tactical Hangar to support the battle
When on the field, all Air Support Drones gain greatly increased Movement Speed

enemy_1144_merlgd_2.Description: The 'War Phantoms' were once a legendary band of mercenaries. Though countless others have appropriated their name, perhaps the legends themselves have yet to fall. Extremely strong and adept at controlling multiple types of Air Support Drones.
enemy_1144_merlgd_2.Name: Legendary War Phantom

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Attacks fire two grenades, significantly reducing the DEF of the target and nearby allies for a short period
Difficult to attack
Will automatically retreat some time after launch

enemy_1145_atkspd.Description: The enemy's offensive Air Support Drones. Its attacks deal AoE Physical damage and reduce the targets' DEF.
enemy_1145_atkspd.Name: Scrap

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Attacks fire two grenades, significantly reducing the DEF of the target and nearby allies for a short period
Difficult to attack
Will automatically retreat some time after launch

enemy_1145_atkspd_2.Description: The enemy's advanced offensive Air Support Drones. Its attacks deal stronger AoE Physical damage and reduce the targets' DEF.
enemy_1145_atkspd_2.Name: Scrap Model-U

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Continually provides boosted DEF and HP recovery to nearby enemy units
Difficult to attack
Will automatically retreat some time after launch

enemy_1146_defspd.Description: The enemy's defensive Air Support Drones. It strengthens the DEF of enemy units within range and slowly recovers their HP.
enemy_1146_defspd.Name: Anvil

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Continually provides boosted DEF and HP recovery to nearby enemy units
Difficult to attack
Will automatically retreat some time after launch

enemy_1146_defspd_2.Description: The enemy's advanced defensive Air Support Drones. It greatly strengthens the DEF of enemy units within range and gradually recovers their HP.
enemy_1146_defspd_2.Name: Anvil Model-B

enemy_1147_dshond.Description: A Sea Terror that grew four limbs, but lacks an internal skeleton. It seems to have once hunted quadrupeds on land.
enemy_1147_dshond.Name: Shell Sea Runner

enemy_1147_dshond_2.Description: A Sea Terror that grew four limbs and has sated its hunger. It controls its body's movements using hydraulic pressure and possesses superior reflexes.
enemy_1147_dshond_2.Name: Nourished Runner

AbilityList.Text: Attacks inflict additional <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</>

enemy_1148_dssbr.Description: A Sea Terror that crawled onto the shore. It brandishes its tough appendages menacingly.
enemy_1148_dssbr.Name: Deep Sea Slider

AbilityList.Text: Attacks inflict additional <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</>

enemy_1148_dssbr_2.Description: A Sea Terror that crawled onto the shore and has sated its hunger. Its appendages can cause protein denaturation.
enemy_1148_dssbr_2.Name: Nourished Slider

enemy_1149_dsbow.Description: A mysterious Sea Terror. In the sea, it can spit at even greater speeds, fast enough to destroy reefs.
enemy_1149_dsbow.Name: Ridge Sea Spitter

enemy_1149_dsbow_2.Description: A mysterious Sea Terror that has sated its hunger. Its spit is a way to deal with natural disasters, rather than as a means of hunting.
enemy_1149_dsbow_2.Name: Nourished Spitter

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Attacks inflict additional <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</>

enemy_1150_dsjely.Description: A Sea Terror that floats in the air. It seems that the next generation will be even more proficient at swimming through the air.
enemy_1150_dsjely.Name: Floating Sea Drifter

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Attacks inflict additional <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</>

enemy_1150_dsjely_2.Description: A Sea Terror that floats in the air and has sated its hunger. Its body contains a blazing-hot organ.
enemy_1150_dsjely_2.Name: Nourished Drifter

AbilityList.Text: Starts battle in Standby and will not attack
After being injured, this unit becomes Combat-Ready, gradually losing HP over time and continually inflicting <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> to nearby units

enemy_1151_dslntc.Description: A Sea Terror that emits ear-splitting screeches. Should its nourishment be interrupted, it will immediately counterattack any nearby threats, until all other signs of life have ceased.
enemy_1151_dslntc.Name: Basin Sea Reaper

AbilityList.Text: Starts battle in Standby and will not attack
After being injured, this unit becomes Combat-Ready, gradually losing HP over time and continually inflicting <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> to nearby units

enemy_1151_dslntc_2.Description: A Sea Terror that emits ear-splitting screeches and has sated its hunger. It is essentially harmless if you don't disturb it.
enemy_1151_dslntc_2.Name: Nourished Reaper

AbilityList.Text: Whenever a certain percentage of HP is lost, immediately deal a large amount of Arts damage and <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> to nearby units

enemy_1152_dsurch.Description: A Sea Terror imbued with impurities. The density of its body tissue surpasses that of some alloys. Victims stabbed by it will feel as if they have been set alight.
enemy_1152_dsurch.Name: Pocket Sea Crawler

AbilityList.Text: Whenever a certain percentage of HP is lost, immediately deal a large amount of Arts damage and <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> to nearby units

enemy_1152_dsurch_2.Description: A Sea Terror imbued with impurities that has had its hunger sated. Such Sea Terrors are rarely seen nowadays, as they are gradually evolving to become more nimble.
enemy_1152_dsurch_2.Name: Nourished Crawler

AbilityList.Text: Prioritizes attacking the target with the current lowest HP percentage within a small area

enemy_1153_dsexcu.Description: A Sea Terror that grew a solid organ. The other parts of its body seem to be forming impregnable outer spikes.
enemy_1153_dsexcu.Name: Primal Sea Piercer

AbilityList.Text: Prioritizes attacking the target with the current lowest HP percentage within a small area

enemy_1153_dsexcu_2.Description: A Sea Terror that grew a solid organ and has had its hunger sated. It sways gently beneath the moonlight.
enemy_1153_dsexcu_2.Name: Nourished Piercer

AbilityList.Text: [Corrosive Vacuoles] Periodically unleashes Vacuoles on the target and a unit in the four adjacent tiles with the lowest Nervous Impairment accumulation, dealing Physical damage and <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</>

enemy_1154_dsmant.Description: The first beautiful living being to speak human language before civilized man. Seaborn.
enemy_1154_dsmant.Name: The First To Talk

AbilityList.Text: Activates nearby Emergency Aid Buildings, greatly enhancing their ability to recover <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</>
Does not deplete Life Points when spared or upon dying, but can be damaged by allied units

enemy_1155_dsrobt.Description: An old Iberian automatic maintenance drone. For some reason, it is still operational and will repair facilities.
enemy_1155_dsrobt.Name: Automatic Maintenance Drone

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by Operators with 3 or more Block
When on the battlefield, naturally regenerates HP of all enemy units
Periodically casts Arts, dealing AoE Arts damage and temporarily reducing Operators' Block
Once defeated, spawns a healing zone on their location that slowly heals allied units within range over time

enemy_1156_hymhr.Description: An instructor employed at the Hymnoi Training Base. Well loved by students and somehow manages to keep their secret binge drinking a secret.
enemy_1156_hymhr.Name: Hymnoi Hero

AbilityList.Text: More likely to be targeted by attacks.

Receives a shield that lasts a short period of time (grants the unit 100% resistance to Physical, Arts, and True damage as well as <$ba.stun>Stun</>, <$ba.sleep>Sleep</>, <$ba.root>Bind</>, <$ba.sluggish>Slow</>, and Shift statuses)
When on the field, slightly reduces DEF of all allied units
When attacked, unleashes a rain of arrows on all deployed Operators, continuously dealing True damage over a short period of time. Duration is refreshed whenever attacked again

enemy_1157_hymwr.Description: An elite warrior employed at the Hymnoi Training Base. Almost certainly holed up at the theater if it's a day off.
enemy_1157_hymwr.Name: Hymnoi Warrior

AbilityList.Text: Immune to Erosion. While in water, gains increased ATK and <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>

enemy_1158_divman.Description: Their daily tasks involve cleaning up trash from the sea. The barrier to entry is low but the pay is surprisingly good, so there are many who sign up for it.
enemy_1158_divman.Name: Diver

AbilityList.Text: Immune to Erosion. While in water, gains increased ATK and <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>

enemy_1158_divman_2.Description: Having been trained in professional diving, they are able to reach the floor of the artificial sea and can be called the elites of the water. Even so, most of them don't dare to try it in the real seas.
enemy_1158_divman_2.Name: Diver Leader

AbilityList.Text: Has a chance to dodge Physical attacks when not blocked

enemy_1159_swfmob.Description: The most commonly seen get-up of Dossoles's delinquents. They intermingle with tourists, ready to join in a fight at any time. Agile and nimble, they can dodge ranged Physical attacks.
enemy_1159_swfmob.Name: Delinquent

AbilityList.Text: Has a chance to dodge Physical attacks when not blocked

enemy_1159_swfmob_2.Description: The favored get-up of pretentious delinquents. They intermingle with tourists, ready to join in a fight at any time. Better at fighting than regular delinquents, they will instinctively dodge ranged Physical attacks.
enemy_1159_swfmob_2.Name: Delinquent Boss

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.stun>Stuns</> allied units after several attacks
Quickly loses HP while under the effects of 'Erosion'

enemy_1160_hvyslr.Description: Brawny brutes who work at the docks or on Pancho's ships. They enjoy playing cards and drinking, and usually spend the day in a drunken haze. Because they regularly work around seawater, they're more subjected to Erosion.
enemy_1160_hvyslr.Name: Dockworker

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.stun>Stuns</> allied units after several attacks
Quickly loses HP while under the effects of 'Erosion'

enemy_1160_hvyslr_2.Description: Giant brutes who work at the docks or on Pancho's ships. They enjoy playing cards and drinking, and usually spend the day in a drunken haze. They're much more robust than regular dockworkers, but they are still quite subjected to Erosion.
enemy_1160_hvyslr_2.Name: Dockworker Leader

AbilityList.Text: Attacks deal damage to the target and all allied units in the target's four adjacent tiles, additionally inflicting <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion</>

enemy_1161_tidmag.Description: Professionally trained casters whose duties involve simulating the tides of Dossoles's sea. Adept at using Originium Arts that mimic the erosive effect of the tides.
enemy_1161_tidmag.Name: Tidal Caster

AbilityList.Text: Attacks deal damage to the target and all allied units in the target's four adjacent tiles, additionally inflicting <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion</>

enemy_1161_tidmag_2.Description: The elites among the Tidal Casters. They are in charge of leading and supervising the Tidal Casters. Extremely adept at using Originium Arts that mimic the erosive effect of the tides.
enemy_1161_tidmag_2.Name: Tidal Leader

AbilityList.Text: Attacks deal damage to the target and all allied units in the target's four adjacent tiles, additionally inflicting <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion</>
The <Caster> will continue battle after the vehicle is destroyed

enemy_1162_magmot.Name: Caster Speedboat

AbilityList.Text: Attacks deal damage to the target and all allied units in the target's four adjacent tiles, additionally inflicting <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion</>
The <Tidal Leader> will continue battle after the vehicle is destroyed

enemy_1162_magmot_2.Description: A Tidal Leader on a speedboat. The Tidal Leader will continue battle after the vehicle is destroyed.
enemy_1162_magmot_2.Name: Tidal Leader Speedboat

The <Dockworker> will continue battle after the vehicle is destroyed

enemy_1163_hvymot.Description: A Dockworker on a motorboat. The Dockworker will continue battle after the vehicle is destroyed.
enemy_1163_hvymot.Name: Dockworker Motorboat

The <Dockworker Leader> will continue battle after the vehicle is destroyed

enemy_1163_hvymot_2.Description: A Dockworker Leader on a motorboat. The Dockworker Leader will continue battle after the vehicle is destroyed.
enemy_1163_hvymot_2.Name: Dockworker Leader Motorboat

enemy_1164_bmbmot.Name: Unmanned Explosive Boat

enemy_1164_bmbmot_2.Name: Unmanned Heavy Explosive Boat

AbilityList.Text: Death deals Physical damage and <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion</> to surrounding units

enemy_1164_bmbmot_3.Name: Pancho's Explosive Boat

Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter

enemy_3003_alymot.Description: A transport vessel carrying supplies for setting up the competition venues. All competitors have the duty of protecting it from attacks.
enemy_3003_alymot.Name: Competition Transport Vessel
