enemy_1165_duhond.Description: An organism controlled by the Dublinn forces. They were originally purchased from a mercenary group. Equipped with a refractive mask crafted by Shadowcasters, they are rather resistant to regular Originium Arts.
enemy_1165_duhond.Name: Dublinn Sniffer Hound

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1165_duhond_2.Description: An organism controlled by the Dublinn forces, they are stronger in combat than the average Hound. They were originally purchased from a mercenary group, and have undergone training for a longer period. Equipped with a refractive mask crafted by Shadowcasters, they are rather resistant to regular Originium Arts.
enemy_1165_duhond_2.Name: Dublinn Sniffer Hound Pro

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1166_dusbr.Description: A scout for the Dublinn forces. With superb concealment techniques, they are the cornerstone of the Dublinn forces' guerilla maneuvers. Equipped with a refractive mask crafted by Shadowcasters, they are rather resistant to regular Originium Arts.
enemy_1166_dusbr.Name: Dublinn Scout

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1166_dusbr_2.Description: A scout leader in the Dublinn forces. The scouts under their command are the cornerstone of the Dublinn forces' guerilla maneuvers. Equipped with a refractive mask crafted by Shadowcasters, they are rather resistant to regular Originium Arts.
enemy_1166_dusbr_2.Name: Dublinn Scout Leader

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1167_dubow.Description: A sniper in the Dublinn forces. The crossbows they wield bear the signs of Columbian modification. Equipped with a refractive mask crafted by Shadowcasters, they are rather resistant to regular Originium Arts.
enemy_1167_dubow.Name: Dublinn Sniper

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1167_dubow_2.Description: A sniper leader in the Dublinn forces. The crossbows they wield bear the signs of Columbian modification and have much greater penetration power. Equipped with a refractive mask crafted by Shadowcasters, they are rather resistant to regular Originium Arts.
enemy_1167_dubow_2.Name: Dublinn Sniper Leader

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1168_dumage.Description: A caster in the Dublinn forces. Their Originium Arts do not stand out, but their innovative breakthrough in mass-producing Arts-resistant masks has placed them in good standing amongst the Dublinn forces.
enemy_1168_dumage.Name: Dublinn Shadowcaster

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1168_dumage_2.Description: A caster leader in the Dublinn forces. Their Originium Arts do not stand out, but the innovative breakthrough of the casters under their command in mass-producing Arts-resistant masks has granted them considerable recognition from their leader.
enemy_1168_dumage_2.Name: Dublinn Shadowcaster Leader

AbilityList.Text: When other Phalanx Infantry are nearby, DEF increases (stacks)
<$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1169_duphlx.Description: A phalanx infantry in the Dublinn forces. The phalanx tactics they utilize evolved from the combat formations used in Gaul. In the phalanx, nearby infantry will support one another, increasing the might of the formation.
enemy_1169_duphlx.Name: Dublinn Phalanx Infantry

AbilityList.Text: When other Phalanx Commanders are nearby, DEF increases (stacks)
<$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1169_duphlx_2.Description: A phalanx commander in the Dublinn forces, they organize the infantry under their command into phalanx formations. The phalanx tactics they utilize evolved from the combat formations used in Gaul. In the phalanx, nearby infantry will support one another, increasing the might of the formation.
enemy_1169_duphlx_2.Name: Dublinn Phalanx Commander

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1170_dushld.Description: A heavy defender in the Dublinn forces. The armor technology they use comes from Victoria, while their boots were designed in Leithanien. Their shields look extremely similar to a newly patented product from Kazimierz's Roar Guards Company.
enemy_1170_dushld.Name: Dublinn Heavy Defender

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1170_dushld_2.Description: A heavy defender leader in the Dublinn forces, they wield much more sophisticated equipment. The armor technology they use comes from Victoria, while their boots were designed in Leithanien. Their shields look extremely similar to a newly patented product from Kazimierz's Roar Guards Company.
enemy_1170_dushld_2.Name: Dublinn Heavy Defender Leader

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</>

enemy_1171_durokt.Description: A flying soldier in the Dublinn forces. The steam propulsion device they use originates from a secret laboratory owned by the Victorian military. As it has only recently been deployed in battle, its power output is still unstable.
enemy_1171_durokt.Name: Dublinn Flying Soldier

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</>

enemy_1171_durokt_2.Description: A flying squad leader in the Dublinn forces. The steam propulsion device they use originates from a secret laboratory owned by the Victorian military and has gone through many iterations. Its power output is relatively stable.
enemy_1171_durokt_2.Name: Dublinn Flying Squad Leader

AbilityList.Text: After first defeat, temporarily transforms into a stone statue with extremely high DEF, then revives as an aerial unit
<$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1172_dugago.Description: A special Arts creation from the Dublinn forces, created by their leader Mandragora. According to Mandragora, back when she was studying Originium Arts in an outskirts cemetery, the Tombkeeper Grotesque was her first companion. Its outer appearance has gone through many redesigns, with the latest being based off a Sarkaz from an ancient bloodline.
enemy_1172_dugago.Name: Tombkeeper Grotesque

AbilityList.Text: After first defeat, temporarily transforms into a stone statue with extremely high DEF, then revives as an aerial unit
<$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1172_dugago_2.Description: A special Arts creation from the Dublinn forces, created by their leader Mandragora. According to Mandragora, back when she was studying Originium Arts in an outskirts cemetery, the Tombkeeper Grotesque was her first companion. Its outer appearance has gone through many redesigns, with the latest being based off a Sarkaz from an ancient bloodline. This series of Tombkeepers embodies Mandragora's fury towards Victoria.
enemy_1172_dugago_2.Name: Enraged Tombkeeper Grotesque

AbilityList.Text: Continuously deals Arts damage and <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</> for the skill duration
Upon death, explodes and deals Arts damage, knocking down nearby Tattered Pillars and instantly defeating other <Dublinn Flamerazers>

enemy_1173_duspfr.Description: A special squad that uses flamethrowers in the Dublinn forces. Their leader's teachings reverberate in their minds as they seek to reforge Terra amidst the endless flames.
enemy_1173_duspfr.Name: Dublinn Flamerazer

AbilityList.Text: Continuously deals Arts damage and <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</> for the skill duration
Upon death, explodes and deals Arts damage, knocking down nearby Tattered Pillars and instantly defeating other <Dublinn Flamerazers>

enemy_1173_duspfr_2.Description: A leader of a special squad that uses flamethrowers in the Dublinn forces. Their leader's teachings reverberate in their minds as they seek to reforge Terra amidst the endless flames.
enemy_1173_duspfr_2.Name: Dublinn Flamerazer Leader

AbilityList.Text: More likely to get attacked by your units
When a <Dublinn Companion Shadowblade> is nearby, activates a field that reduces nearby allied units' ASPD
<$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1174_duholy.Description: A member of the Dublinn forces' elite operations squad. The structure of this squad mimics the military system of ancient Minos. The shields they wield are the culmination of many nations' technologies, providing cover for their partners while advancing, and protecting all nearby allies from harm.
enemy_1174_duholy.Name: Dublinn Companion Guard

AbilityList.Text: More likely to get attacked by your units
When a <Dublinn Elite Companion Shadowblade> is nearby, activates a field that reduces nearby allied units' ASPD
<$ba.refraction>Refraction</>

enemy_1174_duholy_2.Description: A member of the Dublinn forces' elite operations squad, they are much stronger than regular squad members. The shields they wield are the culmination of many nations' technologies, providing cover for their partners while advancing, and protecting all nearby allies from harm.
enemy_1174_duholy_2.Name: Dublinn Elite Companion Guard

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.invisible>Invisible</>
When a <Dublinn Companion Guard> is nearby, significantly increases ASPD

enemy_1175_dushdo.Description: A member of the Dublinn forces' elite operations squad. The structure of this squad mimics the military system of ancient Minos. When they move alongside their partners, they gain powerful stealth capabilities and their attacks are much swifter.
enemy_1175_dushdo.Name: Dublinn Companion Shadowblade

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.invisible>Invisible</>
When a <Dublinn Elite Companion Guard> is nearby, significantly increases ASPD

enemy_1175_dushdo_2.Description: A member of the Dublinn forces' elite operations squad, they are much stronger than regular squad members. When they move alongside their partners, they gain powerful stealth capabilities and their attacks are much swifter.
enemy_1175_dushdo_2.Name: Dublinn Elite Companion Shadowblade

AbilityList.Text: Controls <Purifying Flames> that move along the ground and explode after hitting a melee ally unit, dealing Arts damage and <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</>; damage dealt decreases with distance moved

enemy_1176_dusocr.Description: An evocation caster in the Dublinn forces who can control fireballs. Their leader's teachings reverberate in their minds as they work to purify the corruption of Terra in raging flames.
enemy_1176_dusocr.Name: Dublinn Evocator

AbilityList.Text: Controls <Purifying Flames> that move along the ground and explode after hitting a melee ally unit, dealing Arts damage and <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</>; damage dealt decreases with distance moved

enemy_1176_dusocr_2.Description: An evocation caster leader in the Dublinn forces who can control fireballs, they are more adept at using Originium Arts than their underlings. Their leader's teachings reverberate in their minds as they work to purify the corruption of Terra in raging flames.
enemy_1176_dusocr_2.Name: Dublinn Evocator Leader

AbilityList.Text: When in areas with no visibility, Movement Speed increases

enemy_1178_dscorp.Description: A Gloompincer that escaped from the arenas and adapted to life in the city's sewers. It has grown used to the darkness and has increased Movement Speed under the cover of night.
enemy_1178_dscorp.Name: Undertide Gloompincer

AbilityList.Text: When in areas with no visibility, Movement Speed increases

enemy_1178_dscorp_2.Description: A Gloompincer that escaped from the arenas and adapted to life in the city's sewers. It has grown used to the darkness and become much more savage. It has increased Movement Speed under the cover of night.
enemy_1178_dscorp_2.Name: Undertide Gloompincer α

AbilityList.Text: When in areas with no visibility, attacks deal Arts damage

enemy_1179_aruarw.Description: A crossbowman hired by the Armorless Union, lurking in the city's shadows. They are adept at hiding in the darkness and assassinating their targets with special bolts.
enemy_1179_aruarw.Name: Armorless Union Crossbowman

AbilityList.Text: When in areas with no visibility, attacks deal Arts damage

enemy_1179_aruarw_2.Description: A crossbowman leader hired by the Armorless Union, lurking in the city's shadows and posing a greater threat. They are adept at hiding in the darkness and assassinating their targets with special bolts.
enemy_1179_aruarw_2.Name: Armorless Union Crossbowman Leader

AbilityList.Text: When in areas with no visibility, ATK continuously increases, and resets after the next attack

enemy_1180_aruass.Description: An assassin hired by the Armorless Union, making up for their average skills with clever plots. They are adept at hiding in the darkness, sharpening their blades and continually increasing their ATK.
enemy_1180_aruass.Name: Armorless Union Assassin

AbilityList.Text: When in areas with no visibility, ATK continuously increases, and resets after the next attack

enemy_1180_aruass_2.Description: An assassin hired by the Armorless Union, complementing their remarkable skills with clever plots. They are adept at hiding in the darkness, sharpening their blades and continually increasing their ATK.
enemy_1180_aruass_2.Name: Armorless Union Assassin Leader

AbilityList.Text: Remains Standby for a certain period in areas with <no visibility> and does not attack
If visibility is gained on its location, immediately becomes active

enemy_1181_napkgt.Description: A commonly seen burly knight whose Knightclub affiliation is unknown, considered rogue. They're often found passed out drunk in dark alleyways, and demonstrate violent tendencies when woken up.
enemy_1181_napkgt.Name: Knight Territory Wanderer

AbilityList.Text: Remains Standby for a certain period in areas with <no visibility> and does not attack
If visibility is gained on its location, immediately becomes active

enemy_1181_napkgt_2.Description: A commonly seen burly knight whose Knightclub affiliation is unknown, considered rogue. They're often found passed out drunk in dark alleyways, and should be avoided as they demonstrate ferociously violent tendencies when woken up.
enemy_1181_napkgt_2.Name: Knight Territory Hibernator

AbilityList.Text: Every attack deals <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion</>
After several attacks, the next attack deals more damage

enemy_1182_flasrt.Description: A member of the squad led by Monique. As a member handpicked by the Lazurite based on her preferences, they have a much higher wage. Their attacks inflict Corrosion.
enemy_1182_flasrt.Name: Armorless Union Third Squad

AbilityList.Text: Every attack deals <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion</>
After several attacks, the next attack deals more damage

enemy_1182_flasrt_2.Description: A leader of the squad led by Monique and will take charge when Monique is absent. As a member handpicked by the Lazurite based on her preferences, they have an insanely high wage. Their attacks inflict Corrosion.
enemy_1182_flasrt_2.Name: Armorless Union Third Squad Leader

AbilityList.Text: Every attack deals <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion</>
After several attacks, the next attack deals more damage

enemy_1182_flasrt_3.Description: A Lazurite of the Armorless Union, Monique. She has a habit of recording her own condition in great detail before operations. She hates Roy and anyone who interrupts her work.
enemy_1182_flasrt_3.Name: Lazurite, Monique

AbilityList.Text: Every attack deals <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion</>
After several attacks, the next attack deals more damage

enemy_1183_mlasrt.Description: A member of the cleanup squad personally trained by Roy. Most of the time, Roy takes a hands-off attitude with the squad, so they have adopted some kind of bounty system and are often very thorough in their tasks. Their attacks inflict Corrosion.
enemy_1183_mlasrt.Name: Armorless Union Cleanup Squad

AbilityList.Text: Every attack deals <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion</>
After several attacks, the next attack deals more damage

enemy_1183_mlasrt_2.Description: A leader of the cleanup squad personally trained by Roy. They lead the squad in place of Roy, who refuses to work, and are very experienced. The squad has adopted some kind of bounty system and is often very thorough in their tasks. Their attacks inflict Corrosion.
enemy_1183_mlasrt_2.Name: Armorless Union Cleanup Squad Leader

AbilityList.Text: Every attack deals <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion</>
After several attacks, the next attack deals more damage

enemy_1183_mlasrt_3.Description: A Lazurite of the Armorless Union, Roy. No one knows how a killer managed to achieve such a position and hold it for so many years. Rumor says that his wealth has already surpassed the CEOs of some small companies, while his power exceeds many competition knights.
enemy_1183_mlasrt_3.Name: Lazurite, Roy

AbilityList.Text: [Glimmering Touch] After charging for some time, deals a large amount of Arts damage to a target and all surrounding units
While charging, loses <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>

enemy_1184_cadkgt.Description: A trainee of the Nova Knightclub. With the Candle Knight as its figurehead, this Knightclub with a beautiful name recruits elegant knights proficient in using Arts from far and wide. Though there is occasional displeasure over being forced to imitate the Candle Knight, the popularity and wealth it brings remain a big draw of the Knightclub.
enemy_1184_cadkgt.Name: Nova Knightclub Trainee

AbilityList.Text: [Glimmering Touch] After charging for some time, deals a large amount of Arts damage to a target and all surrounding units
While charging, loses <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>

enemy_1184_cadkgt_2.Description: An elite of the Nova Knightclub. With the Candle Knight as its figurehead, this Knightclub with a beautiful name recruits elegant knights proficient in using Arts from far and wide. Many of these elites have achieved great mastery over their Arts, some even plotting to overthrow the Candle Knight.
enemy_1184_cadkgt_2.Name: Nova Knightclub Elite

AbilityList.Text: [Glimmering Touch] After charging for some time, deals a large amount of Arts damage to a target and all surrounding units
While charging, loses <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>

enemy_1184_cadkgt_3.Description: The Candle Knight, Viviana Droste. Words fail to describe her beauty, her brilliant eyes alone are enchanting enough. Tonight, the marigolds bloom for her.
enemy_1184_cadkgt_3.Name: The Candle Knight Viviana

AbilityList.Text: [Coalescing Fear] Deals Physical damage to all operators with no visibility directly behind them

enemy_1185_nmekgt.Description: Pretenders who began following Nightmare Knight after his battles and 'Performance Art'. Though the form is true, the substance is lacking. Perhaps they can be considered a type of fan as well.
enemy_1185_nmekgt.Name: Nightzmora Imitator

AbilityList.Text: [Coalescing Fear] Deals Physical damage to all operators with no visibility directly behind them

enemy_1185_nmekgt_2.Description: Pretenders who began following Nightmare Knight after his battles and 'Performance Art'. Many attempt to guess at the true identity of the Nightzmora from ancient texts and history books, even though he himself considers it blasphemy against the ancient rituals.
enemy_1185_nmekgt_2.Name: Nightzmora Follower

AbilityList.Text: [Coalescing Fear] Deals Physical damage to all operators with no visibility directly behind them

enemy_1185_nmekgt_3.Description: The Nightzmora has never acknowledged his knightly title. The city and civilization itself are nothing but obstacles on his path of conquest. The meaning modern Kazimierz bestows upon the knights represents a total desecration of his history to which he is so devoted.
enemy_1185_nmekgt_3.Name: 'The Last Kheshig', Tola

AbilityList.Text: After coming into contact with the <Blood Knight>, disappears and restores a certain amount of the <Blood Knight's> HP

enemy_1186_bldbld.Description: Blood that bows to the will of the Blood Knight, re-animating and coagulating into the shape of a sharp blade.
enemy_1186_bldbld.Name: Bloodblade

AbilityList.Text: Gains <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>

enemy_1187_krghd.Description: A wild beast that began appearing in the wilderness several decades ago. Depending on differences in the environment, their bodies and organs undergo various changes.
enemy_1187_krghd.Name: Clawbeast

AbilityList.Text: Gains <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>

enemy_1187_krghd_2.Description: A wild beast that began appearing in the wilderness several decades ago. Depending on differences in the environment, their bodies and organs undergo various changes.
enemy_1187_krghd_2.Name: Ferocious Clawbeast

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Gains <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>

enemy_1188_krgdrn.Description: A custom drone made-to-order for Karlan Trade. It has been modified for operation in sub-zero temperatures.
enemy_1188_krgdrn.Name: Frigid

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Gains <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>

enemy_1188_krgdrn_2.Description: An advanced custom drone made-to-order for Karlan Trade. Not only can it maintain operation in sub-zero temperatures, it is also heavily armed.
enemy_1188_krgdrn_2.Name: Frigid AS.T

enemy_1189_krgaxe.Description: A warrior proficient in icefield combat. Long periods of living on the icefields have tempered their will and physique.
enemy_1189_krgaxe.Name: Icefield Warrior

enemy_1189_krgaxe_2.Description: An elite warrior proficient in icefield combat. Their will and physique are as unbreakable as solid ice on the snow-capped mountains.
enemy_1189_krgaxe_2.Name: Icefield Warrior Leader

AbilityList.Text: Prioritizes attacking the target with the lowest DEF

enemy_1190_krgbow.Description: A hunter living on the icefields. Creatures on the icefields often form groups, and the hunters have become skilled at finding the weakest link in a group of prey.
enemy_1190_krgbow.Name: Icefield Hunter

AbilityList.Text: Prioritizes attacking the target with the lowest DEF

enemy_1190_krgbow_2.Description: A seasoned hunter living on the icefields. After finding the weakest link in a group of prey, they will hound it relentlessly until one of them falls dead.
enemy_1190_krgbow_2.Name: Icefield Hunter Leader

AbilityList.Text: When defeated, deals Arts damage to all surrounding units and inflicts <$ba.cold>Cold</>
Loses HP when shifted

enemy_1191_krgrg.Description: A special warrior born in a harsh environment. While they mainly use Arts in combat, their bodies are simply another one of their weapons. They are at their most dangerous when they fall in battle.
enemy_1191_krgrg.Name: Icefield Arts Fighter

AbilityList.Text: When defeated, deals Arts damage to all surrounding units and inflicts <$ba.cold>Cold</>
Loses HP when shifted

enemy_1191_krgrg_2.Description: A special warrior born in a harsh environment. As they gain insight into their Arts, they become more skilled at utilizing every last bit of their power. They are extremely dangerous when they fall in battle.
enemy_1191_krgrg_2.Name: Icefield Arts Guard

AbilityList.Text: Attacks 2 enemies simultaneously
Every 3rd attack inflicts <$ba.cold>Cold</> to the target
Gains <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>

enemy_1192_krgscr.Description: A caster who has secluded themselves in the mountains to research Arts techniques. By integrating the frost of the icefields into their Arts, they have gained new enlightenment.
enemy_1192_krgscr.Name: Icefield Caster

AbilityList.Text: Attacks 2 enemies simultaneously
Every 3rd attack inflicts <$ba.cold>Cold</> to the target
Gains <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>

enemy_1192_krgscr_2.Description: A caster who has secluded themselves in the mountains to research Arts techniques. The frost has become a part of their Arts, or rather their Arts have become a part of the icefields.
enemy_1192_krgscr_2.Name: Icefield Caster Leader

AbilityList.Text: A berserker of the icefields whose attack power increases when attacking <$ba.frozen>Frozen</> targets
Gains <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>

enemy_1193_krgbsk.Description: A berserker of the icefields. The blistering cold brings them joy, and glacial winds do naught but excite them. An environment that their enemies would consider harsh is nothing out of the ordinary to them.
enemy_1193_krgbsk.Name: Icefield Berserker

AbilityList.Text: A berserker of the icefields whose attack power greatly increases when attacking <$ba.frozen>Frozen</> targets
Gains <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>

enemy_1193_krgbsk_2.Description: A berserker of the icefields. The blistering cold brings them joy, and glacial winds do naught but excite them. To be able to fell their enemies in the tempestuous snow is their greatest bliss.
enemy_1193_krgbsk_2.Name: Icefield Berserker Leader

AbilityList.Text: Gains <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>
Gains increased ATK during <Snowfall>
Attacks lower the target's DEF

enemy_1194_krgmtr.Description: A special ops squad secretly formed in Victoria by SilverAsh, based on the Kjerag folk legend 'Tschäggättä' used to hush crying children. They are able to resist brutally cold temperatures, and are extremely proficient in mountainous combat.
enemy_1194_krgmtr.Name: Tschäggättä

AbilityList.Text: Gains <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>
Gains increased ATK during <Snowfall>
Attacks lower the target's DEF

enemy_1194_krgmtr_2.Description: A special ops squad secretly formed in Victoria by SilverAsh, based on the Kjerag folk legend 'Tschäggättä' used to hush crying children. They are able to resist brutally cold temperatures, and are extremely proficient in mountainous combat. As squad leaders, they are truly the elite among the elite.
enemy_1194_krgmtr_2.Name: Tschäggättä Leader

AbilityList.Text: Spawns 2 <Wooden Seals> when defeated

enemy_1195_sfyin.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. All blades must be sharpened to not lose their edge. A Waregeist of this type tends to be timid and will dash out of harm's way at the first sign of danger.
enemy_1195_sfyin.Name: Grindstone

AbilityList.Text: Spawns 2 <Rosewood Seals> when defeated

enemy_1195_sfyin_2.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. All blades must be sharpened to not lose their edge. A Waregeist of this type tends to be timid, but often goes the extra mile in an attempt to prove itself.
enemy_1195_sfyin_2.Name: Brightmirror

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 2 times to defeat

enemy_1196_msfyin.Description: The original form of 'Grindstone.' Made of modest materials.
enemy_1196_msfyin.Name: Wooden Seal

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 3 times to defeat

enemy_1196_msfyin_2.Description: The original form of 'Brightmirror.' Made of durable materials and adorned with elegant patterns.
enemy_1196_msfyin_2.Name: Rosewood Seal

AbilityList.Text: Spawns 3 <Novel Scrolls> when defeated

enemy_1197_sfshu.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. The world is a strange place, but there is joy to be had. A Waregeist of this type is unusually energetic and likes to hang out with other Waregeists.
enemy_1197_sfshu.Name: Vernacularism

AbilityList.Text: Spawns 3 <Painting Scrolls> when defeated

enemy_1197_sfshu_2.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. Among its serene mountains and waterscapes, one can be free and enjoy themselves without a care in the world. A Waregeist of this type is quiet and refined, bringing joy to other Waregeists.
enemy_1197_sfshu_2.Name: Sophistication

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 3 times to defeat

enemy_1198_msfshu.Description: The original form of 'Vernacularism.' An written account of the world's wondrous happenings.
enemy_1198_msfshu.Name: Novel Scroll

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 4 times to defeat

enemy_1198_msfshu_2.Description: The original form of 'Sophistication.' An illustration of the mountainscapes and spring snow.
enemy_1198_msfshu_2.Name: Painting Scroll

AbilityList.Text: More likely to be attacked by allied units
Spawns 1 <Bronze Mirror> when defeated

enemy_1199_sfjin.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. Beauty is in the eye of the beholder. A Waregeist of this type can show its opponent their inner secrets, and is more likely to anger its opponents than other Waregeists.
enemy_1199_sfjin.Name: Introspection

AbilityList.Text: More likely to be attacked by allied units
Spawns 1 <Brass Mirror> when defeated

enemy_1199_sfjin_2.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. Beauty is in the eye of the beholder. A Waregeist of this type can show its opponent their inner secrets in their most relentless, truest form, and is more likely to anger its opponents than other Waregeists.
enemy_1199_sfjin_2.Name: Scantwords

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 30 times to defeat

enemy_1200_msfjin.Description: The original form of 'Introspection.' Has a simple, unembellished design.
enemy_1200_msfjin.Name: Bronze Mirror

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 35 times to defeat

enemy_1200_msfjin_2.Description: The original form of 'Scantwords.' Has a crystal-clear reflective surface and an elegant design.
enemy_1200_msfjin_2.Name: Brass Mirror

AbilityList.Text: Spawns 15 <Wooden Paperweights> when defeated

enemy_1201_sfzhi.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. It is always difficult to put brush to paper, and though the paperweight was once calm and patient, it is now anxious and restless.
enemy_1201_sfzhi.Name: Inkwave

AbilityList.Text: Spawns 15 <Rosewood Paperweights> when defeated

enemy_1201_sfzhi_2.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. The crouching demon and sleeping dragon solemnly stand guard and ward off evil, and though the paperweight was once stately and majestic, it is now anxious and restless, always ready to attack.
enemy_1201_sfzhi_2.Name: Heartbillow

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 3 times to defeat

enemy_1202_msfzhi.Description: The original form of 'Inkwave.' Made of modest materials.
enemy_1202_msfzhi.Name: Wooden Paperweight

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 4 times to defeat

enemy_1202_msfzhi_2.Description: The original form of 'Heartbillow.' Made of fine, durable materials with an antiquated aesthetic.
enemy_1202_msfzhi_2.Name: Rosewood Paperweight

AbilityList.Text: Upon death, explodes and deals area Arts damage, greatly reducing allied units' ASPD (can be <$ba.buffres>Resisted</>)
Spawns 4 <Celadon Teaware> when defeated

enemy_1203_sfhu.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. When the water comes to a boil, spreading its fragrance far and wide, none can resist partaking in a cup of tea. A Waregeist of this type can paralyze its foes and slow their attacks.
enemy_1203_sfhu.Name: Fountainboil

AbilityList.Text: Upon death, explodes and deals area Arts damage, greatly reducing allied units' ASPD (can be <$ba.buffres>Resisted</>)
Spawns 4 <Porcelain Teaware> when defeated

enemy_1203_sfhu_2.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. Adding water to wine gets you a less potent drink, while adding water to tea creates a richer beverage. A Waregeist of this type can paralyze its foes and slow their attacks. It is tireless, fighting more gallantly by the minute.
enemy_1203_sfhu_2.Name: Rainbowbrew

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 4 times by Arts or True damage to defeat

enemy_1204_msfhu.Description: The original form of 'Fountainboil.' The celadon is fine and exquisite, and its shape simple yet refined.
enemy_1204_msfhu.Name: Celadon Teaware

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 6 times by Arts or True damage to defeat

enemy_1204_msfhu_2.Description: The original form of 'Rainbowbrew.' Bright in color, its shape is elegant and solid.
enemy_1204_msfhu_2.Name: Porcelain Teaware

AbilityList.Text: After several attacks, inflicts continuous Arts damage that slowly increases over time (can be <$ba.buffres>Resisted</>)
Spawns 1 <Celadon Vase> when defeated

enemy_1205_sfpin.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. Crystalline and adorned with engravings of dragons and phoenixes, a Waregeist of this type is graceful and sophisticated, though it's hard to say whether that goes for its temperament too.
enemy_1205_sfpin.Name: Blueflower

AbilityList.Text: After several attacks, inflicts continuous Arts damage that slowly increases over time (can be <$ba.buffres>Resisted</>)
Spawns 1 <Porcelain Vase> when defeated

enemy_1205_sfpin_2.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. Crystalline and adorned with engravings of dragons and phoenixes, a Waregeist of this type is mysterious and imposing in nature, though it is also extremely irritable in temperament and very aggressive.
enemy_1205_sfpin_2.Name: Scarletmist

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 12 times by Arts or True damage to defeat

enemy_1206_msfpin.Description: The original form of 'Blueflower.' The celadon is fine and exquisite, and its shape simple yet refined.
enemy_1206_msfpin.Name: Celadon Vase

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 15 times by Arts or True damage to defeat

enemy_1206_msfpin_2.Description: The original form of 'Scarletmist.' Bright in color, its shape is elegant and solid.
enemy_1206_msfpin_2.Name: Porcelain Vase

AbilityList.Text: Consumes Broken Blades to gain increased ATK
When defeated, each unconsumed Broken Blade will spawn a <Bronze Spearhead> (minimum 1)

enemy_1207_sfji.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. The weaponry dreams of the past, brooding on its utter defeat. A Waregeist of this type holds deep, bottomless grudges, and can be particularly destructive.
enemy_1207_sfji.Name: Sinkingsand

AbilityList.Text: Consumes Broken Blades to gain increased ATK
When defeated, each unconsumed Broken Blade will spawn a <Iron Spearhead> (minimum 1)

enemy_1207_sfji_2.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. The weaponry yet again dreams of the past. A Waregeist of this type rouses its old memories as though it is taking to the battlefield again. Its strength is doubled as it and its peers rally each other.
enemy_1207_sfji_2.Name: Sharpedge

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 25 times to defeat

enemy_1208_msfji.Description: The original form of 'Sinkingsand.' Its surface is severely rusted.
enemy_1208_msfji.Name: Bronze Spearhead

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 30 times to defeat

enemy_1208_msfji_2.Description: The original form of 'Sharpedge.' Although rusted, it is nonetheless an instrument of death. Even though the Waregeist has faded, the killing intent yet lingers.
enemy_1208_msfji_2.Name: Iron Spearhead

AbilityList.Text: Periodically grants temporary <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</> to surrounding enemy units
Spawns 1 <Bronze Lampstand> when defeated

enemy_1209_sfden.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. Its tiny glimmer can flood its surroundings with light. Other Waregeists are invisible under its radiance, as though shrouded by its blessings.
enemy_1209_sfden.Name: Clarity

AbilityList.Text: Periodically grants temporary <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</> to surrounding enemy units
Spawns 1 <Iron Lampstand> when defeated

enemy_1209_sfden_2.Description: A Waregeist that manifested when it was infected by Sui-Xiang. Its tiny glimmer serves as a beacon casting light upon the dark night. A Waregeist of this type not only blesses its peers with its radiance, but is also particularly destructive.
enemy_1209_sfden_2.Name: Magnificence

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 35 times to defeat

enemy_1210_msfden.Description: The original form of 'Clarity.' Its surface is severely rusted.
enemy_1210_msfden.Name: Bronze Lampstand

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 45 times to defeat

enemy_1210_msfden_2.Description: The original form of 'Magnificence.' A thick layer of wax remains inside.
enemy_1210_msfden_2.Name: Iron Lampstand

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Must be damaged 10 times to defeat
After coming into contact with <Sui-Xiang's> <Dantian>, grants it increased Starting HP
After entering Sui-Xiang's Third Form, grants SP to its [Omnidirectional Breath]

enemy_1211_msfsui.Description: An everlasting will-o'-the-wisp shed from Sui-Xiang's body.
enemy_1211_msfsui.Name: Wisp

enemy_1212_mtrfol.Description: A warrior who has flocked to the Guide, inspired by his philosophy. Fights to bring the common goal of the Pathfinders to fruition.
enemy_1212_mtrfol.Name: Pathfinder Legionarius

enemy_1212_mtrfol_2.Description: A powerful warrior who has flocked to the Guide, inspired by his philosophy. Fights to bring the common goal of the Pathfinders to fruition.
enemy_1212_mtrfol_2.Name: Pathfinder Legionarius Prefect

AbilityList.Text: While this unit is holding Ammo, ATK increases. Ammo capacity: 1

enemy_1213_mtrsnp.Description: A warrior proficient at using guns in long-range combat. Their attacks are precise, and especially deadly when loaded with special ammunition.
enemy_1213_mtrsnp.Name: Pathfinder Sagittarius

AbilityList.Text: While this unit is holding Ammo, ATK increases. Ammo capacity: 1

enemy_1213_mtrsnp_2.Description: An elite warrior proficient at using guns in long-range combat. Their attacks are precise, and especially deadly when loaded with special ammunition.
enemy_1213_mtrsnp_2.Name: Pathfinder Sagittarius Prefect

AbilityList.Text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks inflict <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</>. Ammo capacity: 1

enemy_1214_mtrmgc.Description: A caster employing unusual Originium Arts. Able to extract energy from special Arts Units to inflict tremendous devastation.
enemy_1214_mtrmgc.Name: Pathfinder Artifex

AbilityList.Text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks inflict <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</>. Ammo capacity: 1

enemy_1214_mtrmgc_2.Description: A caster employing unusual Originium Arts. Able to extract energy from special Arts Units to inflict horrific devastation.
enemy_1214_mtrmgc_2.Name: Pathfinder Artifex Prefect

AbilityList.Text: Able to land directly onto the battlefield.
Prioritizes attacking 'Gelato Stops'. Deals additional Arts Damage to 'Gelato Stops'.

enemy_1215_ptrarc.Description: A warrior who specializes in dropping into battle from the skies. They take greater pleasure from seeing their foes flustered by the loss of their supplies than actually defeating them.
enemy_1215_ptrarc.Name: Pathfinder Veles

AbilityList.Text: Able to land directly onto the battlefield.
Prioritizes attacking 'Gelato Stops'. Deals additional Arts Damage to 'Gelato Stops'.

enemy_1215_ptrarc_2.Description: An elite warrior who specializes in dropping into battle from the skies. In addition to defeating their enemies, they will also destroy their supplies in the blink of an eye, blowing the battle wide open.
enemy_1215_ptrarc_2.Name: Pathfinder Veles Prefect

AbilityList.Text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks become long-ranged and deal Splash Damage. Ammo capacity: 2
Deals additional Arts damage to 'Gelato Stops'

enemy_1216_cansld.Description: A stalwart warrior who stands on the front lines, firing shells capable of inflicting widespread destruction. By virtue of their physique, they can withstand the recoil from their cannons, as well as hold their own in close combat even without their weapons. Extremely reliable.
enemy_1216_cansld.Name: Pathfinder Ballistarius

AbilityList.Text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks become long-ranged and deal Splash Damage. Ammo capacity: 2
Deals additional Arts damage to 'Gelato Stops'

enemy_1216_cansld_2.Description: A stalwart warrior who rushes forward on the front lines, firing shells capable of inflicting widespread destruction. By virtue of their physique, they can withstand the recoil from their cannons, and are proficient in close combat even without their weapons. Extremely reliable.
enemy_1216_cansld_2.Name: Pathfinder Ballistarius Prefect

AbilityList.Text: While this unit is holding Ammo, periodically summons a <Snack Cart>. Ammo capacity: 3
Deals significantly increased damage to enemies blocking this unit

enemy_1217_rescar.Description: Seems to be an ordinary street vendor. However, their carts are likely loaded with more than just snacks. Anger them at your own peril.
enemy_1217_rescar.Name: Pathfinder Dessert Vendor

AbilityList.Text: While this unit is holding Ammo, periodically summons a <Luscious Snack Cart>. Ammo capacity: 3
Deals significantly increased damage to enemies blocking this unit

enemy_1217_rescar_2.Description: Seems to be an ordinary street vendor. However, their carts are likely loaded with more than just snacks. Those who anger them will soon learn the true meaning of fear.
enemy_1217_rescar_2.Name: Renowned Pathfinder Dessert Vendor

AbilityList.Text: Detonates when blocked, inflicting Arts damage and <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</> to all nearby targets
Explosion deals a large amount of Arts damage to nearby 'Gelato Stops'

enemy_1218_bomscr.Description: A small cart that automatically tracks its delivery target. Of course, you will be able to help yourself to its contents – if you survive the explosion.
enemy_1218_bomscr.Name: Snack Cart

AbilityList.Text: Detonates when blocked, inflicting Arts damage and <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</> to all nearby targets
Explosion deals a large amount of Arts damage to nearby 'Gelato Stops'

enemy_1218_bomscr_2.Description: A small cart that automatically tracks its delivery target. Of course, you will be able to help yourself to its contents – if you survive the massive explosion.
enemy_1218_bomscr_2.Name: Luscious Snack Cart

AbilityList.Text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks become long-ranged and prevent the target from attacking or healing for a period of time. Ammo Capacity: 1
Deals additional Arts damage to 'Gelato Stops'

enemy_1219_mtrbty.Description: A warrior who has taken the initiative to step up to the role of Nuncio within the Pathfinders. Strong and agile, these warriors employ the experience they've gained in their work and prefer to fight by sealing off their opponents' moves.
enemy_1219_mtrbty.Name: Pathfinder Nuncio

AbilityList.Text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks become long-ranged and prevent the target from attacking or healing for a period of time. Ammo Capacity: 1
Deals additional Arts damage to 'Gelato Stops'

enemy_1219_mtrbty_2.Description: The Legatus who stands head and shoulders above the rest, acting on his own principles. Preferring hit-and-run tactics to direct confrontations, he tries to deceive his opponents by sealing off their moves.
enemy_1219_mtrbty_2.Name: Oren, Legatus

AbilityList.Text: Reborn Creation (takes greatly reduced Physical and Arts damage)
Units blocking it gain +1 Block (up to a maximum of +6)

enemy_1220_dzoms.Description: A creation of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' Originium Arts, flexible and difficult to defeat. According to rumors, the Sanguinarch is able to snatch the blood of other creatures, imbuing new life into it and taking it under his control.

AbilityList.Text: Reborn Creation (takes greatly reduced Physical and Arts damage)
Units blocking it gain +1 Block (up to a maximum of +6)

enemy_1220_dzoms_2.Description: One of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' more elaborate creations, flexible and difficult to defeat. According to rumors, the Sanguinarch is able to snatch the blood of other creatures, imbuing new life into it and taking it under his control. Those given new life should praise the Sanguinarch for his benevolence.
enemy_1220_dzoms_2.Name: Touch of Benevolence

AbilityList.Text: Reborn Creation (takes greatly reduced Physical and Arts damage)
Units blocking it gain +1 Block (up to a maximum of +6)

enemy_1221_dzomg.Description: A creation of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' Originium Arts that bears greater vitality. One who was powerful in life will continue to be a great threat to their enemies even after being reshaped by the power of the Sanguinarch's blessing.

AbilityList.Text: Reborn Creation (takes greatly reduced Physical and Arts damage)
Units blocking it gain +1 Block (up to a maximum of +6)

enemy_1221_dzomg_2.Description: A creation of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' Originium Arts that bears exceptional vitality. One who was powerful in life will continue to be a great threat to their enemies even after being reshaped by the power of the Sanguinarch's blessing. Therefore, those who continue ought to thank the Sanguinarch for his magnanimity.
enemy_1221_dzomg_2.Name: Gift of Magnanimity

enemy_1222_dpvt.Description: A warrior of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed with the living blood of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. After falling in battle for the first time, his blood will continue to advance in his place.

AbilityList.Text: Will be reborn as a <Touch of Benevolence> after falling in battle for the first time

enemy_1222_dpvt_2.Description: A captain of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed with the living blood of the Sanguinarch of Vampires, more dangerous than a normal Sarkaz Royal Court Soldier. After falling in battle for the first time, his blood will continue to advance in his place.
enemy_1222_dpvt_2.Name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Warrior Captain

AbilityList.Text: Continuously charges up Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery; when interrupted, the Defense Artillery will lose a portion of its charge progress
Will be reborn as a <Touch of the Sanguinarch> after falling in battle for the first time

enemy_1223_dmech.Description: An artificer of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed with the living blood of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. They gained a portion of Victoria's engineering expertise and are responsible for operating the reloading system of Londinium's city defense artillery.
enemy_1223_dmech.Name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Artificer

AbilityList.Text: Continuously charges up Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery; when interrupted, the Defense Artillery will lose a portion of its charge progress

enemy_1223_dmech_2.Description: An artificer captain of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed with the living blood of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. They gained a great amount of Victoria's engineering expertise and are responsible for operating the reloading system of Londinium's city defense artillery.
enemy_1223_dmech_2.Name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Artificer Captain

AbilityList.Text: While in battle, Reborn Creations have increased ATK, and their attacks will additionally deal <$ba.dt.apoptosis>Necrosis</>

enemy_1224_dsuply.Description: An armored supply vehicle blessed by the Sanguinarch of Vampires. While on the battlefield, enhances Gift of the Sanguinarch and Touch of the Sanguinarch.

AbilityList.Text: While in battle, Reborn Creations have increased ATK, and their attacks will additionally deal <$ba.dt.apoptosis>Necrosis</>

enemy_1224_dsuply_2.Description: An armored supply vehicle meticulously blessed by the Sanguinarch of Vampires. While on the battlefield, enhances Gift of the Sanguinarch and Touch of the Sanguinarch.
enemy_1224_dsuply_2.Name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Retrofit ASV

Will be reborn as a <Gift of the Sanguinarch> after falling in battle for the first time

enemy_1225_dkmage.Description: A caster of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed by the Sanguinarch of Vampires. Trained by the Royal Court, they pose a wide-ranging threat on the battlefield with their Arts.
enemy_1225_dkmage.Name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Chain Caster

AbilityList.Text: Attacks deal <$ba.dt.apoptosis>Necrosis</> and jump between 4 targets, with each jump dealing reduced damage

enemy_1225_dkmage_2.Name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Chain Caster Captain

AbilityList.Text: Gains increased ATK for each Reborn Creation on the battlefield
Will be reborn as a <Gift of the Sanguinarch> after falling in battle for the first time

AbilityList.Text: Gains increased ATK for each Reborn Creation on the battlefield
Will be reborn as a <Gift of Magnanimity> after falling in battle for the first time

enemy_1226_dklord_2.Description: An elite soldier of the Sarkaz Royal Court blessed by the Sanguinarch of Vampires. The wrath of their compatriots slain on the battlefield builds up within them, making them more than eager to tear apart every last enemy of the Sarkaz.
enemy_1226_dklord_2.Name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Wrathgorger

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
<$ba.invisible>Invisible</>, gradually loses HP over time
Attacks charge Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery

enemy_1227_dair.Description: An engineering drone requisitioned by the Sarkaz Royal Court. They are a part of Londinium's defense system, modified to be more stealthy, but at the cost of greater wear-and-tear.
enemy_1227_dair.Name: Sarkaz Requisitioned Engineering Drone

<$ba.invisible>Invisible</>, gradually loses HP over time
Attacks charge Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery

enemy_1227_dair_2.Name: Sarkaz Requisitioned Cutting-Edge Drone

AbilityList.Text: Attacks restore HP proportional to damage dealt

enemy_1228_dslime.Description: A creation of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' Originium Arts. They always thirst for more blood, strengthening themselves by stealing the blood of others.

enemy_1228_dslime_2.Description: A creation of the Sanguinarch of Vampires' Originium Arts. Though their bodies are already engorged with the blood of others, their thirst never ceases.
enemy_1228_dslime_2.Name: Engorged Heir

AbilityList.Text: Attacks deal <$ba.dt.apoptosis>Necrosis</>

enemy_1229_darmy.Description: A soldier of the Sarkaz Royal Court. Londinium's munitions factories work day and night to produce weapons for the Sarkaz war effort. They boast a distinctly Sarkaz fighting style, but with greater discipline.

AbilityList.Text: Attacks deal <$ba.dt.apoptosis>Necrosis</>

enemy_1229_darmy_2.Description: An elite soldier of the Sarkaz Royal Court. Under Manfred's training, they are not only more formidable warriors, but also more professional.
enemy_1229_darmy_2.Name: Sarkaz Royal Court Elite Soldier

AbilityList.Text: Spawns Nethersea Brand at its location when defeated
Gains increased RES

enemy_1230_dsbudr.Description: A Sea Terror that has inexplicably grown a chitinous skull. There is no corresponding organ to be found beneath it.
enemy_1230_dsbudr.Name: Nethersea Founder

AbilityList.Text: Spawns Nethersea Brand at its location when defeated
Gains increased RES

enemy_1230_dsbudr_2.Description: A Sea Terror that generally only metamorphoses within an abundance of the nethersea brand. They can on exceptionally rare occasions be born from the remains of their multiple kin.
enemy_1230_dsbudr_2.Name: Nourished Founder

AbilityList.Text: Spawns Nethersea Brand at its location when defeated
Leaves its remains on location when defeated

enemy_1230_dsbudr_4.Description: A special individual among the Founders. Heeding the call of We Many, its body is ready to be preyed upon.
enemy_1230_dsbudr_4.Name: Regressed Founder

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked while on Nethersea Brand
Gains Physical and Arts dodge (disabled by certain <$ba.debuff>negative statuses</>)

enemy_1231_dsrunr.Description: A Sea Terror that has learned to use its chitinous skull to deal physical attacks, storing scraps of food in its body comprised of countless tiny creatures.
enemy_1231_dsrunr.Name: Nethersea Predator

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked while on Nethersea Brand
Gains Physical and Arts dodge (disabled by certain <$ba.debuff>negative statuses</>)

enemy_1231_dsrunr_2.Description: A Sea Terror that has learned to hunt efficiently. They themselves do not appear to require nutrients, instead reserving them for their lower-level kin. Before they die, they turn themselves into one last food source.
enemy_1231_dsrunr_2.Name: Nourished Predator

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked while on Nethersea Brand
Leaves its remains on location when defeated
[Directed Evolution] Gains Physical and Arts dodge (disabled by certain <$ba.debuff>negative statuses</>)

enemy_1231_dsrunr_4.Description: A special individual among the Predators. Heeding the call of We Many, its body is ready to be preyed upon.

After falling below half HP, gains increased DEF and Block requirement

enemy_1232_dssalr.Description: A new type of Sea Terror formed from a colony that was about to decay and die. In order to effectively utilize the last bit of nutrients in their bodies, all they need to do is smear themselves across the ground.

AbilityList.Text: After falling below half HP, spreads Nethersea Brand to tiles it travels over
After falling below half HP, gains increased DEF and Block requirement

enemy_1232_dssalr_2.Description: Even if not on the verge of death, they will still choose to expand the survival range of their kin using their own flesh and blood. Reminiscent of the Bishop's final journey back to Iberia.

AbilityList.Text: After falling below half HP, spreads Nethersea Brand to tiles it travels over
Leaves its remains on location when defeated

enemy_1232_dssalr_4.Description: A special individual among the Brandguiders. Heeding the call of We Many, its body is ready to be preyed upon.

Attacks 3 enemies simultaneously

enemy_1233_dsshtr.Description: Possesses a hard, chitinous shell that it uses to protect itself, possibly capable of sporulation or a similar function. A commonly seen Sea Terror where the nethersea brand proliferates.
enemy_1233_dsshtr.Name: Nethersea Spewer

AbilityList.Text: Can attack all targets located on Nethersea Brand
Attacks 3 enemies simultaneously

enemy_1233_dsshtr_2.Description: A Sea Terror that has largely lost control of its functions, spewing out its spore-like progeny at a rate that surpasses its physical capacity, causing it to wear itself out prematurely.

Has <$ba.buffres>Status resistance</> and is immune to <$ba.sluggish>Slow</>

enemy_1234_dsubrl.Description: A rare Sea Terror, able to manipulate the tiny creatures in the air and on the ground to eat away at their surroundings even in the absence of the nethersea brand. They seem to call the brand itself to life, hence their name.

AbilityList.Text: Continually inflicts Arts damage and <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> in an area around it
Has <$ba.buffres>Status resistance</> and is immune to <$ba.sluggish>Slow</>

enemy_1234_dsubrl_2.Description: A special and extremely-rare individual, boasting incredible destructive power and far-reaching transmission range. They are unable to be dealt with through conventional means, Inquisitors must be extra vigilant around them.

[Directed Evolution] Has <$ba.buffres>Status resistance</> and is immune to <$ba.sluggish>Slow</>

enemy_1234_dsubrl_4.Description: A special individual among the Swarmcallers. Heeding the call of We Many, its body is ready to be preyed upon.
enemy_1234_dsubrl_4.Name: Regressed Swarmcaller

AbilityList.Text: Gains <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</> when on Nethersea Brand
Gains increased ATK for each time it deals damage, decaying quickly after it stops attacking
Deals increased damage to enemies blocking this unit

enemy_1235_dsbskr.Description: An extremely aggressive individual born from the nethersea brand, capable of inflicting tremendous damage to its surrounding environment for its kin to transform. Lifeforms not considered kin fall under this category.
enemy_1235_dsbskr.Name: Nethersea Reefbreaker

AbilityList.Text: Gains <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</> when on Nethersea Brand
Gains increased ATK for each time it deals damage, decaying quickly after it stops attacking
Deals increased damage to enemies blocking this unit

enemy_1235_dsbskr_2.Description: A Sea Terror born from the nethersea brand, used to expel entities that pose a significant threat to its kin, or to completely destroy environments unsuitable for sustaining life. All civilizations on land fall under this category.
enemy_1235_dsbskr_2.Name: Nourished Reefbreaker

AbilityList.Text: Gains <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</> when on Nethersea Brand
Leaves its remains on location when defeated
[Directed Evolution] Gains increased ATK after successfully dealing damage, decaying quickly after it stops attacking

enemy_1235_dsbskr_4.Description: A special individual among the Reefbreakers. Heeding the call of We Many, its body is ready to be preyed upon.
enemy_1235_dsbskr_4.Name: Regressed Reefbreaker

AbilityList.Text: When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals a certain percentage of Arts damage

enemy_1238_ltmob.Description: Armed militants disguised as Infected, they are well-acquainted with the local situation. They look no different from ordinary Infected and easily blend into the crowd.
enemy_1238_ltmob.Name: 'Street Layabout'

AbilityList.Text: When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals a certain percentage of Arts damage

enemy_1238_ltmob_2.Description: Armed militants disguised as Infected, they are overly acquainted with the local situation, to the point that they have become alcoholics hanging around the street pubs, their mission long forgotten.
enemy_1238_ltmob_2.Name: 'Street Drunk'

AbilityList.Text: When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals an additional hit

enemy_1239_ltbow.Description: Armed militants disguised as Infected, they know the local situation by heart. Their weapon of choice is the triangle simply because it is easy to carry around, and definitely not because the triangle has no grade certification and is easy to play.
enemy_1239_ltbow.Name: 'Street Performer'

AbilityList.Text: When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals an additional hit

enemy_1239_ltbow_2.Description: Armed militants disguised as Infected, they are overly acquainted with the local situation. Aware that they may be exposed by their unfamiliarity with other instruments, they choose to use the triangle.
enemy_1239_ltbow_2.Name: 'Street Musician'

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 2 Block
When in Realigned Flux, DEF and RES are greatly reduced

enemy_1240_ltgint.Description: An Originium Arts creation that sacrifices stability for miniaturization. Well-equipped for breaching, it is often used to break through enemy lines. Like its creator, it is vulnerable to interference from external energy.
enemy_1240_ltgint.Name: Mass-Produced Colossus

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 2 Block
When in Realigned Flux, DEF and RES are greatly reduced

enemy_1240_ltgint_2.Description: An Originium Arts creation that sacrifices stability for miniaturization. Very well-equipped for breaching, it is often used to break through enemy lines. Its physical strength has been improved but its weakness to interference remains an issue.
enemy_1240_ltgint_2.Name: Enhanced Mass-Produced Colossus

AbilityList.Text: Attacks 2 enemies simultaneously
When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals Splash damage

enemy_1241_ltmage.Description: One of the backbones of the Leithanian army. Able to cause large area damage under relatively stable conditions. Absent support equipment and personnel, they are vulnerable to interference from external energy.
enemy_1241_ltmage.Name: Spire Caster

AbilityList.Text: Attacks 2 enemies simultaneously
When attacking targets outside of Realigned Flux, deals Splash damage

enemy_1241_ltmage_2.Description: A Spire Caster with experience in war. Specializes in causing extreme area damage under relatively stable conditions. While highly confident, they are still vulnerable to interference from external energy.
enemy_1241_ltmage_2.Name: Battleworn Spire Caster

AbilityList.Text: Attacks can travel along Realigned Flux, dealing damage to all connected units

enemy_1242_ltsmag.Description: Cunning remnants of the Witch King, they were once violinists of a certain orchestra in the capital. Years of lying low have honed their observational prowess, and they will make use of anything to defeat their enemies.
enemy_1242_ltsmag.Name: Remnant Violinist

AbilityList.Text: Attacks can travel along Realigned Flux, dealing damage to all connected units

enemy_1242_ltsmag_2.Description: Scheming remnants of the Witch King, they were once the principal violinist of a certain orchestra in the capital. It's said that they stole their position from another by forcing the stage setup to be changed.
enemy_1242_ltsmag_2.Name: Remnant Principal Violinist

AbilityList.Text: When blowing at full force, fires ranged attacks in all 4 directions, dealing high Physical damage to allies hit. These attacks can be blocked by Realigned Flux

enemy_1243_ltswar.Description: Irritable remnants of the Witch King, they once attempted to bribe their way into a certain orchestra in the capital. After many years of lying low, they have lost much of their sanity and now try to tear their enemies apart using music itself.
enemy_1243_ltswar.Name: Remnant Saxophonist

AbilityList.Text: When blowing at full force, fires ranged attacks in all 4 directions, dealing high Physical damage to allies hit. These attacks can be blocked by Realigned Flux

enemy_1243_ltswar_2.Description: Hysterical remnants of the Witch King, they once spent large sums of money to join a certain orchestra in the capital, yet were too impatient to arrange a rehearsal of the saxophone concerto with their sponsor.
enemy_1243_ltswar_2.Name: Remnant Official Saxophonist

AbilityList.Text: Prioritizes targets on Realigned Flux, <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them and continually dealing Arts damage while cutting off nearby Realigned Flux

enemy_1244_ltssch.Description: Stubborn remnants of the Witch King, they were once the composer of a certain orchestra in the capital. During their many years of lying low, they researched vile arts nearly lost to mankind, staining their hands red with blood, yet they have little to show for it.
enemy_1244_ltssch.Name: Remnant Field Caster

AbilityList.Text: Prioritizes targets on Realigned Flux, <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them and continually dealing Arts damage while cutting off nearby Realigned Flux

enemy_1244_ltssch_2.Description: Unrepentant remnants of the Witch King, they were once the sponsor of a certain orchestra in the capital. There are whispers of connections to the Spire, but most of these turned out to be nothing more than far-fetched rumors.
enemy_1244_ltssch_2.Name: Remnant Elite Field Caster

AbilityList.Text: Can appear in the battlefield

enemy_1246_aslime.Description: A wild infected creature that normally lives in the nomadic city's sewers, it has surfaced after being provoked. It emits an unpleasant odor, but what's more vexing is that no one knows where they will pop up from next.
enemy_1246_aslime.Name: Blackwater Originium Slug

AbilityList.Text: Can appear in the battlefield

enemy_1246_aslime_2.Description: A wild infected creature that is more dangerous than a normal Blackwater Originium Slug. It normally lives in the nomadic city's sewers, but has surfaced after being provoked. Both its striking odor and its elusiveness often catch people off-guard.
enemy_1246_aslime_2.Name: Blackwater Originium Slug α

AbilityList.Text: Attacks two targets simultaneously.
Cannot be blocked.
Can create a <Virtual Image> at the current location

enemy_1247_ltgtld.Description: Gertrude Strollo, Lehnsfrau of Vyseheim and a researcher of energy induction and redirection. Suffers from chronic insomnia and often goes without sleep.
enemy_1247_ltgtld.Name: Dame Gertrude

AbilityList.Text: Blocks 1 instance of Physical or Arts damage

enemy_1249_lysdb.Description: Guard personnel of Rhine Lab. With their company-provided anti-riot gear and training, they are qualified for escort duties.
enemy_1249_lysdb.Name: Rhine Defense Member

AbilityList.Text: Blocks 1 instance of Physical or Arts damage

enemy_1249_lysdb_2.Description: Security personnel of Rhine Lab. With their company-provided anti-riot gear and advanced training, they are much more qualified for escort duties.
enemy_1249_lysdb_2.Name: Rhine Defense Senior Member

AbilityList.Text: Recovers the HP of inactive <R-Series Power Armors>

enemy_1250_lyengs.Description: An engineer of Rhine Lab. Responsible for both providing equipment and giving their professional opinion on its production, they also maintain a close relationship with the Energy Section.
enemy_1250_lyengs.Name: Rhine Engineering Member

AbilityList.Text: Recovers the HP of inactive <R-Series Power Armors>

enemy_1250_lyengs_2.Description: A senior engineer of Rhine Lab. Energy managed to convince Columbia's officials to provide the company more funding, so Engineering took the chance to design and produce even more sophisticated equipment.
enemy_1250_lyengs_2.Name: Rhine Engineering Senior Member

AbilityList.Text: When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers some SP

enemy_1251_lysyta.Description: A product of Dorothy's failed experiments. An irregularly-shaped silver object emanating a soft glow, like a slumbering Dreamland.
enemy_1251_lysyta.Name: Dor-1 Failure

AbilityList.Text: When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers some SP

enemy_1251_lysyta_2.Description: A product of Dorothy's failed experiments. An irregularly-shaped silver object emanating a soft glow, its unusual appearance instinctively scares people away from it.
enemy_1251_lysyta_2.Name: Dor-α Failure

AbilityList.Text: When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers some SP

enemy_1252_lysytb.Description: A product of Dorothy's repeated experiments. She was fascinated by its beauty when it was first created.
enemy_1252_lysytb.Name: Dor-2 Replica

AbilityList.Text: When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers some SP

enemy_1252_lysytb_2.Description: A product of Dorothy's repeated experiments. Even though it fell far below expectations, she remains ever hopeful.
enemy_1252_lysytb_2.Name: Dor-β Replica

AbilityList.Text: When not blocked, Physical and Arts damage taken is significantly reduced
When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers a lot of SP

enemy_1253_lysytc.Description: A product of Dorothy's private experiments. To her, it is not a mere creation, it is her family, her dream.
enemy_1253_lysytc.Name: Dor-3 Bionic

AbilityList.Text: When not blocked, Physical and Arts damage taken is significantly reduced
When touching an inactive <R-Series Power Armor>, the Power Armor recovers a lot of SP

enemy_1253_lysytc_2.Description: A product of Dorothy's private experiments. Dreams must ultimately feed back into reality, and she hopes to be a warm and safe harbor.
enemy_1253_lysytc_2.Name: Dor-γ Bionic

enemy_1254_lypa.Description: An unpiloted Power Armor. It is able to function without a pilot, but nevertheless maintains high agility.
enemy_1254_lypa.Name: Experimental Power Armor

enemy_1254_lypa_2.Description: An unpiloted Power Armor. It seems to have a mind of its own, and even experienced engineers struggle to tell if it's being piloted.
enemy_1254_lypa_2.Name: Test Power Armor

AbilityList.Text: [Overload] Continuously deals Physical damage to the target proportional to the unit's ATK, and<$ba.stun>Stuns</> the target

enemy_1255_lybgpa.Description: A model that appeared around half a year ago among some mercenary groups, its performance is on par with mass-produced military models from five years ago. Rhine Lab's Energy Section cooperates with many parties, and continues to look for ever more opportunities.
enemy_1255_lybgpa.Name: R-31 Heavy Power Armor

AbilityList.Text: [Overload] Continuously deals Physical damage to the target proportional to the unit's ATK, and<$ba.stun>Stuns</> the target

enemy_1255_lybgpa_2.Description: A model that appeared around half a year ago among some mercenary groups, its performance is on par with mass-produced military models from five years ago. Technology is unregulated, so Columbians continue to seek greater efficiency within the bounds of the law.
enemy_1255_lybgpa_2.Name: R-31a Heavy Power Armor

AbilityList.Text: Attacks 4 enemies simultaneously

enemy_1256_lyacpa.Description: A model equipped with long-ranged weapons, massively increasing its offensive capabilities. While these experimental weapons are still in the prototype phase, its energy and firepower cannot be overlooked.
enemy_1256_lyacpa.Name: R-11 Assault Power Armor

AbilityList.Text: Attacks 4 enemies simultaneously

enemy_1256_lyacpa_2.Description: A model equipped with long-ranged weapons, massively increasing its offensive capabilities. It's difficult to imagine what sort of changes might come about if this tech could be mass-produced.
enemy_1256_lyacpa_2.Name: R-11a Assault Power Armor

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.
Can deploy traps. Allies who step on them will receive Arts damage and be <$ba.stun>Stunned</> for some time

enemy_1257_lydrty.Description: Dorothy Franks, director of Rhine Lab's Originium Art Section. With the power of both technology and ideals, she hopes to eliminate the differences between people. The weak will always receive her protection.
enemy_1257_lydrty.Name: Dorothy

AbilityList.Text: Initially has 100% Physical Dodge for a period of time

enemy_1258_durman.Description: A somewhat tipsy Durin. Just inebriated enough to think they're battling against some evil creature.
enemy_1258_durman.Name: Alcohol Lover

AbilityList.Text: Initially has 100% Physical Dodge for a period of time

enemy_1258_durman_2.Description: A piss-drunk Durin. 'I'm not drunk! Who said I was drunk? Was it you?!'
enemy_1258_durman_2.Name: Alcohol Association Member

AbilityList.Text: Upon dropping below half HP for the first time, gains 100% Physical Dodge for a period of time

enemy_1259_durwar.Description: An amateur lifeguard doing nothing in particular. Because there really was nobody in need of saving, he instead decided to take up boxing, and unexpectedly had quite the talent for it.
enemy_1259_durwar.Name: Lakeside Volunteer

AbilityList.Text: Upon dropping below half HP for the first time, gains 100% Physical Dodge for a period of time

enemy_1259_durwar_2.Description: A professional lifeguard who goes around shooting the breeze. Strong in stature and bronzed in complexion, one look at him is enough to give a sense of security. But in actuality, he can't swim at all, and got that tan from high-intensity outdoor boxing training.
enemy_1259_durwar_2.Name: Lakeside Lifeguard

enemy_1260_durmag.Description: A Durin who has made a hobby out of building sandcastles. He despises those who would kick up the waters of the artificial lake, and so he installed an Arts Unit onto his construction tool.
enemy_1260_durmag.Name: Sandcastle Builder

enemy_1260_durmag_2.Description: A Durin who has made a career out of designing sandcastles. Having accepted the reality that it is impossible to actually build a sandcastle, he has not even been drafting designs recently, instead focusing his efforts on tinkering with the Arts Unit.
enemy_1260_durmag_2.Name: Sandcastle Architect

AbilityList.Text: Gains increased ATK with each attack (up to a limit); when affected by certain <$ba.debuff>Negative Statuses</>, these stacks will be lost

enemy_1261_dursho.Description: A volleyball-serving cart designed for use by friendless tourists. However, they see no use at all, as there are far too many people coming to play volleyball.
enemy_1261_dursho.Name: Volleyball Serving Cart

AbilityList.Text: Gains increased ATK with each attack (up to a limit); when affected by certain <$ba.debuff>Negative Statuses</>, these stacks will be lost

enemy_1261_dursho_2.Description: A volleyball-spiking cart designed as a revenge against someone. Continuously makes powerful spikes at nearby people in an attempt to ruin all volleyball matches on the beach.
enemy_1261_dursho_2.Name: Volleyball Spiking Cart

AbilityList.Text: Can stop <Self-Driving Carts>
When not blocked, Physical and Arts damage taken is significantly reduced

enemy_1262_durplc.Description: A sturdy mechanical surfing instructor that can withstand strong winds and waves. Its weaknesses are twofold: despite its anti-rust coating, it still rusts easily, and also it doesn't float.
enemy_1262_durplc.Name: Full Metal Surfing Instructor

AbilityList.Text: Can stop <Self-Driving Carts>
When not blocked, Physical and Arts damage taken is significantly reduced

enemy_1262_durplc_2.Description: A sturdy mechanical surfing instructor that can withstand water and corrosion. High-density rare alloys were incorporated to increase its resistance to rust, but as such, it sinks even harder.
enemy_1262_durplc_2.Name: Alloy Surfing Instructor

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by Operators with 3 or more Block
When next to enemies that are both non-Machine and non-Leader, they will be loaded inside as passengers (up to 3 max), and will be unloaded when this unit is defeated

enemy_1263_durbus.Description: A beach buggy beloved by all. Carries three passengers in addition to the driver. Cool and breezy on the inside, it's perfect for those tuckered out from playing.
enemy_1263_durbus.Name: Fully-Enclosed Beach Buggy

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by Operators with 3 or more Block
When next to enemies that are both non-Machine and non-Leader, they will be loaded inside as passengers (up to 3 max), and will be unloaded when this unit is defeated

enemy_1263_durbus_2.Description: A beach buggy beloved by all. Though its capacity is the same, all its other peripherals have been upgraded - in particular, the AC unit that effortlessly makes driver and passengers alike shiver.
enemy_1263_durbus_2.Name: Competitive-Grade Beach Buggy

AbilityList.Text: Upon taking damage for the first time, gains significantly increased ASPD and Movement Speed for a period of time

enemy_1264_durgrd.Description: A powerful machine that sends chills across the beach with its might, providing a complimentary water cannon service for drunkards by the lake. The only downside being that it has no way of actually identifying who is drunk.
enemy_1264_durgrd.Name: Mead-Grade Waker-Upper

AbilityList.Text: Upon taking damage for the first time, gains significantly increased ASPD and Movement Speed for a period of time

enemy_1264_durgrd_2.Description: A terrifying machine that sweeps across the beach, equipped with an ultra-powerful water cannon strong enough to blast any drunkard to their senses. After someone secretly tampered with its targeting logic, it now only blasts sober people.
enemy_1264_durgrd_2.Name: Whiskey-Grade Waker-Upper

AbilityList.Text: Upon colliding with an enemy unit, inflicts Physical damage that ignores Dodge and inflicts a brief <$ba.stun>Stun</>
Can be equipped with components to gain additional effects

enemy_1265_durcar.Description: A modular self-driving cart popular throughout Zeruertza. Order yours today and we'll include an additional 'Kaboom Augment! Self-Driver Siege Mode' starter model, for no additional cost!
enemy_1265_durcar.Name: Self-Driving Cart

AbilityList.Text: The more enemies defeated, the higher its HP, ATK, and DEF when spawned from the Twigs That Crave
Releases Corruption, causing your nearby units to continuously lose HP

enemy_1266_nhapos.Description: Part of the Nachzehrer army. The longer they remain on the battlefield, the harder they are to defeat, absorbing the enemy's strength as they grow increasingly deadly.
enemy_1266_nhapos.Name: Rot Eater

AbilityList.Text: Releases Corruption when defeated, causing your nearby units to continuously lose HP

enemy_1267_nhpbr.Description: Part of the Nachzehrer army. Death cannot stop their corrupting presence, as their corpses continue to corrupt the land.
enemy_1267_nhpbr.Name: Sarkaz Witherer

AbilityList.Text: Releases Corruption when defeated, causing your nearby units to continuously lose HP

enemy_1267_nhpbr_2.Description: Elite member of the Nachzehrer army. Death simply causes them to spread their corruption even faster, leaving behind a wasteland where few could survive.
enemy_1267_nhpbr_2.Name: Sarkaz Witherer Captain

AbilityList.Text: Continuously heals the Twigs That Crave

enemy_1268_nhnrs.Description: Part of the Nachzehrer army. They are able to heal their kin as they attack the enemy. Life is a constant cycle of devouring and sharing.
enemy_1268_nhnrs.Name: Sarkaz Wither Caster

AbilityList.Text: Continuously heals the Twigs That Crave

enemy_1268_nhnrs_2.Description: Elite member of the Nachzehrer army. Experts at healing their kin as they attack the enemy. Life is a constant cycle of devouring and sharing.
enemy_1268_nhnrs_2.Name: Sarkaz Wither Caster Captain

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Self-destructs when near an Operator, dealing Physical damage

enemy_1269_nhfly.Description: Originium Arts creation of the Nachzehrer King. Mindless except for an obsession with self-destruction. They create death for others to feed upon.
enemy_1269_nhfly.Name: Seed of Withering

AbilityList.Text: Flying unit.
Self-destructs when near an Operator, dealing Physical damage

enemy_1269_nhfly_2.Description: Originium Arts creation of the Nachzehrer King. It is a violation of the laws of nature, rejecting life for death. They create death for others to feed upon.
enemy_1269_nhfly_2.Name: Seed of Decay

AbilityList.Text: Attacks cause the target to take Arts damage over time; effect removed when the target is healed

enemy_1270_nhstlk.Description: Originium Arts creation of the Nachzehrer King. Fast-moving, they do not understand the concept of healing. They exist only to create death, and the power of healing robs them of their powers.
enemy_1270_nhstlk.Name: Rotchaser

AbilityList.Text: Attacks cause the target to take Arts damage over time; effect removed when the target is healed

enemy_1270_nhstlk_2.Description: Originium Arts creation of the Nachzehrer King. They do not understand the concept of healing, even if they are stopped. They exist only to create death. Thoughts are incompatible with death, and they never stop.
enemy_1270_nhstlk_2.Name: Rampaging Rotchaser

AbilityList.Text: When blocked for the first time, devours the blocker. DEF is greatly increased, but Movement Speed is reduced
Returns devoured Operator when defeated

enemy_1271_nhkodo.Description: Part of the Nachzehrer army. Devours any obstacle in its way, including the living. Anything and everything is food to it.
enemy_1271_nhkodo.Name: Sarkaz Wither Devourer

AbilityList.Text: When blocked for the first time, devours the blocker. DEF is greatly increased, but Movement Speed is reduced
Returns devoured Operator when defeated

enemy_1271_nhkodo_2.Description: Elite member of the Nachzehrer army. Devours any obstacle in its way, including the living. Anything and everything is food to it. Only death can make it surrender what it devoured.
enemy_1271_nhkodo_2.Name: Sarkaz Wither Maw

AbilityList.Text: Only attacks ground units
Melee attacks deal more damage
After several attacks, the next attack will release Corruption

enemy_1272_nhtank.Description: Equipment of the Nachzehrer army, clearing up obstacles for the army's march. It is a powerful siege weapon, but its main role is to spread corruption.
enemy_1272_nhtank.Name: Sarkaz Wither Tank

AbilityList.Text: Only attacks ground units
Melee attacks deal more damage
After several attacks, the next attack will release Corruption

enemy_1272_nhtank_2.Description: Advanced equipment of the Nachzehrer army, clearing up obstacles for the army's march. Its attack power increases at close range. It is a powerful siege weapon, but its main role is to spread corruption.
enemy_1272_nhtank_2.Name: Advanced Sarkaz Wither Tank

AbilityList.Text: Capable of long-range attacks
Locks on to the target with the highest max HP and bombards it several times, dealing Arts damage to the unit in range with the highest HP percentage

enemy_1273_stmgun.Description: Part of Londinium's city defenses. Has a large attack area. Built by the city's workers in their factories.
enemy_1273_stmgun.Name: Londinium Mobile Defense Artillery

AbilityList.Text: Capable of long-range attacks
