enemy_8011_mcndog_3.Description:
A risk assessment machine built by Mechanist. His best friend.
He set twenty defensive programs to prevent Closure from meddling with it.
enemy_8011_mcndog_3.Name: Structural Principle

AbilityList.Text: When other Barrenlands Musbeasts are nearby, ATK increases (stacks)

enemy_7016_shushu.Description: A musbeast commonly found in the barrens. Though not particularly aggressive by nature, they become a bottomless pit of ruined foodstuffs when in groups.
enemy_7016_shushu.Name: Barrenlands Musbeast

AbilityList.Text: Deals more damage when attacking resources

enemy_7017_miner.Description: A familiar sight in mine shafts for millennia. Laborers have always propped up the pinnacles of civilization with their rugged hands, but found their own feet mired in the mud of the label 'uncivilized.'
enemy_7017_miner.Name: Mine Drudge

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked by Operators or Summons; explodes when Blocked and deals great AoE damage

enemy_7018_scarab.Description: The name of this Originium Slug may actually be a misnomer, as the volatile part is actually the 'harvest' between its legs. When asked about this, its namers claimed that these creatures were too fast to be closely observed.
enemy_7018_scarab.Name: Volatile Originium Slug

AbilityList.Text: Cannot be blocked.

enemy_7019_thief.Description: There will always be thieves out in the barrens, and they come in all shapes and sizes. These are no different, just that they carry treasure chests and run really fast.
enemy_7019_thief.Name: Wilderness Rogue

AbilityList.Text: Retreats into its shell upon taking damage, reducing any further physical and Arts damage to 0. In this state, upon receiving damage from allied Operators, deals physical damage equal to 100% of their own ATK to the attacker. Will come out from its shell after taking no damage for a period of time

enemy_7020_xbtor.Description: A type of hard and prickly shellbeast. If it retracts its head into its shell, just save your energy.
enemy_7020_xbtor.Name: Spined Shellbeast

AbilityList.Text: Upon taking damage, becomes Invulnerable and cannot move for a period of time

enemy_7021_xbmoth.Description: A small creature that can only be seen far from nomadic cities. With a flutter of its wings, it escapes once more into the shadows.
enemy_7021_xbmoth.Name: Luminous Fowlbeast

AbilityList.Text: As her HP being reduced, her damage taken from units not blocked by herself is also gradually reduced to 0
Gains increased ATK when making consecutive attacks. (Resets when affected by <$ba.frozen>Freeze</>, <$ba.stun>Stun</>, or <$ba.levitate>Levitate</>)

enemy_7022_gatgod.Description: A priestess whose allure reflects her power. The more eye-catching her flowers, the sharper her blade.
enemy_7022_gatgod.Name: Zümrütrüyası Priestess

AbilityList.Text: When unblocked, damage taken is reduced by 50%

enemy_7023_gatbb.Description: An acolyte whose charm reflects her power. The more delicate her flowers, the swifter her blade.
enemy_7023_gatbb.Name: Zümrütrüyası Acolyte

AbilityList.Text: Deals heavy <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</> to nearby units every second, and recovers a huge amount of HP every second
Become Silenced during the Wet Season or when <$ba.frozen>Frozen</>

enemy_7024_clking.Description: No matter where they go, the troubadours who cross the barrens to entertain others will always be surrounded by graceful, flickering flames and deafening cheers.
enemy_7024_clking.Name: Wandering Troubadour

AbilityList.Text: Attacks deal <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</>, and recovers HP every second
Become Silenced during the Wet Season or when <$ba.frozen>Frozen</>

enemy_7025_clbb.Description: The young apprentices who follow behind the Wandering Troubadours are not yet proficient at controlling flames, but can already perform the critical job of moving the oil cannisters.
enemy_7025_clbb.Name: Wandering Apprentice

AbilityList.Text: Normally does not attack, but counters when attacked
After 2 attacks, the next attack deals heavy Physical damage to targets within range and inflicts <$ba.stun>Stun</>
When HP falls below 50%, gains significantly increased ASPD

enemy_7026_xbele.Description: Nobody knows when this colossus was created. It responds to time with silence, its fists acting as their persevering faith.
enemy_7026_xbele.Name: Timestream Guardian

AbilityList.Text: Periodically gains a Shield that blocks damage; the Shield lasts for 80 attacks before breaking
When below 50% HP, attacks all units within Attack Range at the same time

enemy_7027_xbbtl.Description: An unusual lifeform that appears in crystal caves. It endeavored and molted into the sturdiest of shells, yet still cannot escape its enemy's ruthless pursuit. Forever at odds with Crystalline Oberobeasts.
enemy_7027_xbbtl.Name: Crystalline Titanibeast

AbilityList.Text: Attacks strike twice; when below 50% HP, attacks strike 4 times instead
Reduces the target's DEF with each attack
Upon approaching a Crystalline Titanibeast, instantly slays it and obtains some of its abilities; afterwards, each attack now strikes 4 times

enemy_7028_xbscp.Description: An unusual lifeform that appears in crystal caves. It resembles a metal crab with sharper pincers, allowing it to easily tear its prey apart. Forever foes with Crystalline Titanibeasts.
enemy_7028_xbscp.Name: Crystalline Oberobeast

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</>; has increased Attack Range while in <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</>
Attacks deal Arts splash damage
Crashes upon losing a certain percentage of HP, dealing heavy damage in an area and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> itself
After a period of time, reenters <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</> status

enemy_7029_pilot.Description: One of Sargonian Lords Ameer's subordinate. They always appear in unexpected places, ripping opposing frontlines apart as they roam the land.
enemy_7029_pilot.Name: Sailraider

AbilityList.Text: [Sandstorm's Dustwake] Increases the Movement Speed and ASPD of enemies within a certain range (including self)
Devours the blocker when blocked (up to a maximum of 3), and increases the effect of [Sandstorm's Dustwake]

enemy_7030_skodo.Description: One of Sargonian Lords Ameer's subordinate. Sand pervades sky, dust obstructs sun. Life collapses, evil flourishes.
enemy_7030_skodo.Name: Dustweaver

AbilityList.Text: First Form

[Annihilation] Causes the next attack to <$ba.stun>Stun</> the target, and makes itself unblockable by allied Operators and Summons; deals a large amount of Arts damage when passing through allied units
Second Form
Increases ATK and ASPD

enemy_7031_ghking.Description: Time and time again it grows weaker, and yet it gets back up every time. This is the Annihilator—this is Sargon.
enemy_7031_ghking.Name: Annihilator

AbilityList.Text: Moves at regular speed only when in visible range

enemy_7034_xbmsn.Description: Laborers such as these can be seen everywhere across the barrens. Their diligence is their greatest virtue.
enemy_7034_xbmsn.Name: Diligent Laborer

AbilityList.Text: <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</>

enemy_7044_xblbug.Description: Wild and infected, it can glide a short distance on the wind with its small wings, enough to fly over obstacles and evade capture.
enemy_7044_xblbug.Name: Flying Originium Slug

AbilityList.Text: Gradually accelerates when moving. Its first attack at max speed <$ba.stun>stuns</> targets blocking it.

enemy_7045_xbtd.Description: Wild and infected, it can move extremely quickly to survive in the harsh environment of the barrens, using its acceleration to either charge its foes with its horn or escape out of reach.
enemy_7045_xbtd.Name: Charging Originium Slug

AbilityList.Text: Physical and Arts damage taken from blocking units are greatly reduced.

enemy_7046_xbslug.Description: Wild and infected, it is much more resistant to physical harm than regular Originium Slugs in order to survive in the harsh environment of the barrens. The sharp corners on its shell make it difficult for predators to attack.
enemy_7046_xbslug.Name: Armored Originium Slug

AbilityList.Text: Appears disguised as another enemy. Does not attack when disguised.
Reveals true form upon taking damage.
Chance to drop <Standard-Issue Item> when defeated.
Periodically creates <Fresh Water> when held in <Large Corral>.

enemy_7047_xbdit.Description: Curious little creatures that roam the wilderness, able to emulate images in mirages. The latest research indicates that this is not a true transformation, but merely an optical illusion.
enemy_7047_xbdit.Name: 'Liquid Shifter'

AbilityList.Text: Starts immune to Physical and Arts damage below a certain amount.
When taking more than a certain amount of damage in a single instance, falls down and randomly drops a large amount of Minor Ingredients (triggers only once), losing its damage reduction effect.
Periodically drops <Crude Gold> when held in <Large Corral>.

enemy_7049_xbnum.Description: Burdenbeasts that once served the lord ameers have escaped into the wilderness, still carrying their loads. Their time in captivity has made them more agile than normal burdenbeasts, and better at fighting those who would take them captive again.
enemy_7049_xbnum.Name: Rogue Burdenbeast

AbilityList.Text: Exotic Beast
During <Thunderstorm> and <Thunderburst>, always draws thunder strikes to the tiles it passes through while itself is immune to thunder strike damage.

During <Scorching Sun> and <Bright Sun>, attacks inflict a certain percentage of ATK as <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</>. Allied units within a certain range also take extra damage when <$ba.dt.burning>Burn</> bursts.
Gains <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</> and increased attack range in <Sandstorm> and <Great Sandstorm>.

enemy_7051_xbcas.Description: A mossback beast covered in thale, a plant native to Arsalan that is highly sensitive to environmental changes. This allows the Thalebeast to predict shifts in the weather.
enemy_7051_xbcas.Name: Thalebeast

AbilityList.Text: Helps your side when on the field; unblockable.
During <Thunderstorm> and <Thunderburst>, always draws thunder strikes to the tiles it passes through while itself is immune to thunder strike damage.

During <Scorching Sun> and <Bright Sun>, attacks inflict a certain percentage of <$ba.dt.burning2>Burn</>. Nearby enemy units also gain a certain percentage of <$ba.elementfragile>Elemental Fragility</>.
Gains <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</> and increased attack range in <Sandstorm> and <Great Sandstorm>.
Rarer species have increased stats.

enemy_7053_xbcasz.Description: A mossback beast covered in thale, a plant native to Arsalan that is highly sensitive to environmental changes. This allows the Thalebeast to predict shifts in the weather.
enemy_7053_xbcasz.Name: Thalebeast

AbilityList.Text: Exotic Beast, Aerial
Tiles it passes through become seeded. Enemies on seeded tiles have increased ASPD.
Seeds nearby tiles and deals a percentage of Arts damage to all nearby allied units whenever a certain amount of HP is lost. Additionally, temporarily reduces Physical and Arts damage taken.
Stops attacking and using skills when HP drops below a certain threshold, instead flying towards the objective. Upon reaching the objective, disappears and moves to another stage.

[Rampant Growth] Periodically selects several Operators (prioritizing those on seeded tiles), dealing a percentage of ATK as Arts splash damage. Defeated targets have significantly longer Redeployment Time.

[Seed of Life] Gains the following ability in Strange Territory Difficulty 6: Enemies on seeded tiles self-destruct when defeated, dealing a percentage of their ATK as Arts damage to nearby allied units and <$ba.stun>stunning</> them for several seconds.

enemy_7054_xbsmi.Description: Spreads vanilla seeds from the air, bringing the scent of revival to war-scarred Arsalan.
enemy_7054_xbsmi.Name: Vanillawing

AbilityList.Text: Aerial, helps your side when on the field; does not attack building materials.
Tiles it passes through become seeded. Allies on seeded tiles have increased ASPD, and deal increased damage to <Monoliths>, <Strange Ore Veins>, and mechanical enemies.
[Rampant Growth] Plants flowers on several allies, reducing their Redeployment Time after their next retreat.
Rarer species have increased stats and enhanced [Rampant Growth] Redeployment Time reduction.

enemy_7056_xbsmiz.Description: Spreads vanilla seeds from the air, bringing the scent of revival to war-scarred Arsalan.
enemy_7056_xbsmiz.Name: Vanillawing

AbilityList.Text: Exotic Beast, unblockable.
Movement speed gradually increases while moving (up to a max). Upon colliding with allied units, deals Physical damage equal to a percentage of ATK and <$ba.stun>stuns</> them for several seconds.
Periodically stops moving and gains a Barrier equal to a percentage of max HP (does not stack).
Burrows underground when HP drops below a certain threshold, gaining increased DEF and RES. After some time, disappears and moves to another stage.
[Earth Spike] Gains the following ability in Strange Territory Difficulty 4: Collision damage has a greater area and reduces targets' ATK.
[Deep Dive] Gains the following ability in Strange Territory Difficulty 6: When Movement Speed is at max, tiles it passes through are no longer deployable.

enemy_7057_xbrok.Description: 'The ground's shaking! It's quaking! It's...' Before the observer can finish, the Quicksand Beast has already closed the distance. Its long maw easily cleaves through rocks, while a casual flick of its tail stirs up dust clouds. Within seconds, it burrows deep beneath the rock layers, leaving only dusty faces.
enemy_7057_xbrok.Name: Quicksand Beast

AbilityList.Text: Helps your side when on the field; unblockable.
Movement speed gradually increases while moving (up to a max). Upon colliding with enemies, deals Physical damage equal to a percentage of ATK and <$ba.stun>stuns</> them for several seconds.
Can pick up Building Materials that it passes by (no limit).
[Earth Spike] Choose an allied Operator within range. Continuously stirs up mud and sand to grant a strong Barrier that gradually decays.
Rarer species have increased stats and enhanced [Earth Spike] Barrier.

enemy_7059_xbrokz.Description: 'The ground's shaking! It's quaking! It's...' Before the observer can finish, the Quicksand Beast has already closed the distance. Its long maw easily cleaves through rocks, while a casual flick of its tail stirs up dust clouds. Within seconds, it burrows deep beneath the rock layers, leaving only dusty faces.
enemy_7059_xbrokz.Name: Quicksand Beast

AbilityList.Text: Deals Physical damage to surrounding units upon death

enemy_9001_ayokai.Description: This type of drone typically lacks company branding, yet the crowd greets it with deafening cheers whenever it appears on the field. The reason is simple: it scatters coins when shot down.
enemy_9001_ayokai.Name: Surprise Sponsor Drone

AbilityList.Text: Periodically grants temporary ASPD and Movement Speed boosts to another enemy unit with the highest Max HP and is not currently affected by this skill

enemy_9002_adsham.Description: These casters spread the hunger of the bloodborn all around, allowing the Sarkaz to savor the defeat of their enemies.
enemy_9002_adsham.Name: Sarkaz Bloodthirst Caster

AbilityList.Text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 4 Block
Grants 1 Ammo to enemy units it passes by

enemy_9003_askate.Description: A Lateran pushing around boxes of ammunition. Apparently, whenever his comrades need bullets, he will drop from the sky to deliver what they need. A true 'angel'.
enemy_9003_askate.Name: Pathfinder Armicustos

AbilityList.Text: Every time HP percentage falls below a certain threshold, immediately frees surrounding prisoner enemies

enemy_9004_anlock.Description: A convict in charge of prison maintenance, for everything from the building itself to the imprisonment devices. When the jailers aren't looking, they will spontaneously start prison riots.
enemy_9004_anlock.Name: Technician Prisoner

AbilityList.Text: Attacks deal Physical splash damage and apply <$ba.cold>Cold</>

enemy_9005_aicemn.Description: A ruthless archer of the icefields. Cold as glaciers, her arrows induce hypothermia, as if dragging victims into the depths of a frigid abyss.
enemy_9005_aicemn.Name: Glacial Archer

AbilityList.Text: Doubles and plunders newly earned points when on the battlefield
Drops accumulated points when defeated

enemy_5501_arcbank.Description: Easter egg present in many games. He seems to think of gaming as an industry that belongs to him, and tries to exact a toll from every player it encounters.
enemy_5501_arcbank.Name: Tycoon

AbilityList.Text: Drops a large amount of points and increases Movement Speed significantly for a short time after losing a certain amount of HP

enemy_5502_arcthf.Description: Classic easter egg present in many games. He encountered your game as he was fleeing pursuit. Defeat him to earn a great windfall.
enemy_5502_arcthf.Name: Treasure Thief

AbilityList.Text: Periodically spawns 3 <Jello>

enemy_5503_arcslma.Description: A character from the game SUPER HOOK. Hired to clean the place, it continuously splits up as it scrubs the floor.
enemy_5503_arcslma.Name: Jelly Kid

AbilityList.Text: High Movement Speed
Does not increase stage points in SUPER HOOK

enemy_5504_arcslmi.Description: A character from the game SUPER HOOK. It was split from Jelly Kid and follows its lead in scrubbing the floor.
enemy_5504_arcslmi.Name: Jello

AbilityList.Text: Upon colliding with an enemy unit, inflicts Physical damage that ignores Dodge and inflicts a brief <$ba.stun>Stun</>
Can collect <Washed-Up Parts> to improve performance

enemy_5505_arctxi.Description: A character from the game HURDLE SPEEDER, a ship-car that sails the land. Elaborate and flimsy, its precious yet fragile value can only be expressed through continuous journey.
enemy_5505_arctxi.Name: 'The Amphibian' Ship-Car

AbilityList.Text: Disappears when <'The Amphibian' Ship-Car> passes through, increasing its performance based on component form
Treasure Rudder
Doubles <'The Amphibian' Ship-Car>'s current points
Warding Waves
<'The Amphibian' Ship-Car> becomes <$ba.invisible>Invisible</>
Twin Cutlasses
Increases <'The Amphibian' Ship-Car>'s ATK significantly

enemy_5506_arcgo.Description: A character from the game HURDLE SPEEDER, an ordinary bottle that was not fitted with the wheels necessary to become a ship-car. Contains useful components that may improve a ship-car's performance.
enemy_5506_arcgo.Name: 'Washed-Up Parts'

AbilityList.Text: Permanently Invulnerable
Gains extra points when passing through Pure White Steam

enemy_5507_arctolm.Description: A character from the game FOUNTAIN WAR. Furry creature that escaped from Fashion Street. Dolly wants it to come back? Who cares? Playing with Pure White Steam is more important!
enemy_5507_arctolm.Name: Fountain 'Soda Knight'
